Jaune and Ruby left the room and Ruby prepared to leave and see what life as Jaune would be like. Just after Ruby left with his life, Jaune hears a familiar voice behind him.

"Ruby! Are you ready?" Weiss was standing across the room dressed in her usual white dress. "I promised to help you train today and you're not even ready?" Weiss scoffed.

Jaune looked back to see the ice queen yelling out his new name, which was going to take some getting used to. He wasn't fully used to his new outfit and name yet, wearing her outfit is one thing, but her name, that is something he needs to really be careful with. However, training with Weiss while wearing Ruby's outfit will not be easy either.

Being Ruby is going to be so exhausting... Jaune thought.

"Sorry! Ru... I mean Jaune just left, I'm ready." Jaune said only just catching his almost potentially fatal mistake. Weiss would get really suspicious if he keeps misspeaking or acts out of character, which means he has to be just as active as Ruby, which could take a lot of energy.

"Then come on, you need to start studying after like you promised."
1213112111.title: They Go with Ruby's Life Swap Idea

choices: Admit the truth.
Try to bluff his way out.
Something else.
12131121113.content:
Weiss took Jaune across the hallway back to her…their room. As Jaune was living Ruby’s life right now, he guessed it was technically his too. He had come over to their dorm enough times to know which desk was Ruby’s but his body walked automatically to it without much though as Weiss closed the door behind him. He noticed a half opened bag on Ruby’s desk with a towel, water bottle, and other things she would need for a training session. As their weapons were kept in lockers, they would grab them on the way to the arena.

“Ready to go?” Weiss asked.

“…Yes.” Jaune answered. He wasn’t sure how he was going to be able to fight living as Ruby. He wasn’t used to her clothes and he just realized that instead of a basic sword and shield, he was going to have to try to use Ruby’s masterpiece, Crescent Rose. A giant scythe that could transform into a high caliber rifle. Weiss raised an eyebrow and Jaune also noted he wasn’t acting nearly as excited as Ruby would have. “I mean… Yep! Can’t wait. I’m gonna win this time.”

“Uh huh. Like that will happen.”

Weiss lead the way as the two of them made their way to the locker room outside a free arena. Jaune opened the locker he instinctively knew was Ruby’s. His hand even turned the lock without him realizing it. The remote really made it easy to live her life and he was wondering if Ruby was doing okay. It was kind of embarrassing to act all preppy around Weiss on the walk down. He even found himself skipping a little.

“You okay?” Weiss asked suddenly. “You’ve been quiet… well, quieter than usual.”

“Just thinking about R-…Jaune and something we talked about earlier,” Jaune lied.

“Well, you shouldn’t let Yang know you’re thinking about him,” Weiss commented, pulling out her dust rapier and refilling a couple vials. “She would get even more annoying.”

“She would, wouldn’t she?” Weiss nodded and Jaune shrugged. “It’s nothing like that, sh-… he’s just a good friend.”

“Of course,” Weiss agreed. “We could hardly forget about Ruby running around in your body.”

“Yeah, I bet she’s having-… what?!” Jaune gaped at her. Weiss slowly turned toward him with a dark smile.

“I overheard your conversation. Now, why don’t you just admit it… Jaune.”
12131121113.title: Weiss Overheard Their Conversation.

choices: Weiss makes a swap between them.
Weiss chooses a specific target.
Weiss decides they are going to prank Ruby.
121311211131.content:
“How-… what-…?” Jaune spluttered as Weiss stared daggers through him. “Ah… yeah, we did. But how did you find out?”

“I overheard you two talking about swapping with a remote,” Weiss explained, walking around Jaune and examining him. “Then Ruby suggesting you swap lives. While I didn’t understand everything, I was glad I overheard what I did.”

“Er, why are you circling me?” Jaune asked nervously.

“I really can’t understand it,” Weiss muttered, more to herself than him. “You look exactly like Ruby and I can’t detect any differences.” This was important to Jaune because he saw himself in Ruby’s clothes and hairstyle. “The only reason I knew you two swapped was because of a couple slip ups from you, almost unnoticeable, and what I overheard.” She reached into the pocket of Ruby’s dress that Jaune was wearing and pulled out a remote. ”Is this the device?”

“Yes,” Jaune admitted. “Each button is a different type of swap.”

“Oh?” Weiss raised an eyebrow. “Tell me which one is which.” It was not a request.

Jaune spent a few minutes explaining the remote to her along with what he knew. The only thing he didn’t mention was the instruction pamphlet since he told her everything. Thinking back, he probably should have lied. There was no way Weiss would have been able to verify her suspicion. He did have a crush on her so that might have played to her advantage there.

“So… are you mad?” Jaune asked.

“Of course,” Weiss stated. “Though most of it is directed at Ruby. For the life of me I can’t figure out why she thought it was a smart idea to let a guy swap lives with her. Did she think about what would happen if a boy saw us all changing?” Her eyes narrowed.

“Hey!” Jaune protested. “I wouldn’t have watched. I would have looked away. For your information I was planning to avoid the room for that very reason. The only reason I went back was because Ruby promised to train with you.”

“I actually promised her that,” Weiss corrected him. “Hmm. What to do? I really want to see if this works and that you and Ruby/Jaune aren’t pranking me.”

“Did you… want to make a swap?” Jaune asked. “We just need to… er… both be touching the remote to recognize the swap.”

Weiss went silent for a moment as she thought about it.

“Yes,” she finally told him. “I have decided. As punishment for going along with Ruby, you are going to come with me while I test and record the functions of this remote.”

Jaune almost groan but the thought of spending all day with Weiss was exciting.
121311211131.title: Admit the truth.

choices: They make another swap between them.
Weiss wants to go out and try it on others.
Jaune has an idea.
1213112111311.content:
“The first thing I want to do is test this to make sure this remote is real.” Weiss stated.

“You still don’t believe me?” Jaune asked slightly offended.

“I can’t see why you would like and your detail explanation seems legitimate,” Weiss admitted. “However, you have to think how implausible something like this is. You may be Ruby trying to trick me. Yang could have easily put you up to this.” She looked around expecting Yang to jump out from behind a locker.

“I can understand that,” Jaune admitted. “What do you want to swap?”

“You and ‘Jaune’ supposedly swapped lives,” Weiss decided. “So that would mean Jaune is in your life, even if I see you as Ruby. If that is the case, I will not trust a boy in my life. So I figured a simple swap will do.” She held out the remote. “You said you had to touch it right? Go on then.”

“What are you planning to swap?” Jaune asked nervously.

“You’ll see,” Weiss said with a devious smile. “This will be obvious.” Her finger clicked a button Jaune couldn’t make out.

There was a flash of green light.

Immediately, Jaune felt unstable as Ruby’s combat boots were replaced with high heeled boots. Weiss was standing in front of him now wearing Ruby’s red and black gothic dress, cloak, and combat boots. He looked down and saw his new dress was white which slowly changed to blue. In the mirror, he was staring at himself with Ruby’s hair and in her life, now wearing Weiss’s clothes. He quickly stabilized himself. Growing up with sisters, this wasn’t the first time he wore high heels.

“I… can’t…. this is impossible,” Weiss muttered, staring at the mirror. “So you really are Jaune?”

“That’s what I've been telling you.” Jaune realized Weiss still saw him as Ruby, but now wearing her clothes. “Huh. Ruby won’t notice we swapped clothes. If we swap lives back, she will be wearing your outfit.”

“Hmm, fascinating.” Weiss twirled the remote in her hand. “So the order of the swaps does matter.” She hummed to herself and then quickly rummaged around in her locker before pulling out a notepad. “Here,” she said tossing it to Jaune. “Keep track of my findings.”

“Er, what?” Jaune was confused.

“The first thing we need to do is examine this systematically,” Weiss explained. “Ruby is off doing who knows what in your life and this is your punishment for trying to sneak into our dorm. Do this and I’ll forget about it.”

“I guess that’s fair,” Jaune conceded. “Besides, I wanted to learn more about this. I showed it to Ruby because I wanted someone to help test it. You’re smart, so I bet we are going to learn a lot.”

“Flattery won’t help you, Arc,” Weiss told him, though her words were missing the usual harsh tone. “Let’s see. What next?”
1213112111311.title: Weiss and Jaune Swap

choices: Blake and Yang
Ren and Nora
Coco and Velvet
12131121113112.content:
Weiss pushed the remote into Jaune’s hand and pressed the undo button. There was a flash of green light and both of them were back in their normal clothes.

“You swapped us back?” Jaune asked confused.

“That was only a test to make sure the remote really existed,” Weiss stated. “I want to limit the number of active swaps until we start systematically trying out different orders to see the effect. You also stated the Personal Info option could have some unpredictable affects. I only hit the Undo button rather than Reset because I don’t want Ruby to return yet. After I have a chance to perform more tests, then I’m going to prank her back.”

“By prank, nothing too bad, right?” Yang had mentioned once Weiss’s pranks were really bad, like disguising raisin cookies as chocolate chip. Ruby had trust issues for a week after that. They were either pointless or just went too far.

“No. I just want to get back at her.” Storing her extra belonging she brought with her in her locker, she shut the door and locked it. “Let’s go then. I want to find some test subjects.”

“Okay,” Jaune agreed hurrying after her. “Anyone in particular or what swap you want to do? I’ve done Body, Personal Info with a name, and Life. Plus the Clothes Swap with you just now. First two weren’t very long though. Didn’t get to see how things changed.”

“A good experiment starts with simple observations and then gets more precise. For now, let’s find some good targets and go from there. I want to see how things change after a swap from their perspective.”

Eventually, they find two people.
12131121113112.title: Search for Targets

choices: Small Cosmetic Change
Large Cosmetic Change
Personal Info Swap
121311211131121.content:
Weiss and Jaune walked through the halls of Beacon, with Weiss a little in the lead. Anyone who saw them would just think Weiss was leading Ruby somewhere, but the truth was the two of them were looking for targets. They wanted a small group of people out of the way so Weiss could decide what to swap. The problem was most people were in large noisy areas and those in the hallway were going from one place to other. None of them were good targets. They were about to try to find an occupied training room when Weiss stopped and looked out the window.

“Perfect.” She elbowed Jaune in the side and pointed to the tree on Beacon’s ground. It was the same tree Blake had been reading under when Jaune discovered the remote. She was still under it, hours later. It must have been a really good book. This time, Yang was standing over her, talking. She must have just come from the gym, because she was wearing an orange tank top and black sports short rather than her uniform. Based on Blake’s expression, Yang must have just said one of her world famous puns. “Let’s swap with them.”

“Okay,” Jaune agreed, deciding not to mention Blake had been his original test subject. “What option do you want to try first?”

“Life swap would put whoever clicked the button in their position, right?” Weiss questioned.

“Yeah. The swapped person would be over here and believe they are me, well Ruby since I’m in her life.”

“So order is important… hmm.” Weiss eye’s seemed to glaze over as she thought about something. “Okay, I want you to swap something with Blake.”

“Why?”

“Because I want to see what changes would happen after a life swap,” Weiss explained. “I still see you as Ruby, since you swapped before I knew about the remote and couldn’t touch it. Right now, it’s more like you possessed her than swapped. I want to see you swap something, cosmetic preferably, to see if I notice Ruby being changed, not you. Order of swaps seems to be important.”

“Right, that makes sense. Didn’t think too much about that myself,” Jaune admitted.

“It’s the reason I’m making the plans and you are writing what we discover.” Weiss reminded him.

Jaune nodded and held up the remote. Because Blake wasn’t moving, it was going to be an easy swap. All Weiss was asking for was something physical. That could be body, body part, wardrobe, or other swaps involving Personal Information. As they had tried a Wardrobe Swap already, Jaune suspected Weiss wouldn’t appreciate that as much as the others. He also had to be careful what he swapped. If he swapped, say Blake’s chest with his own, Weiss might accuse him of being a pervert. If he wanted to that, he might want to do an entire body swap.

Jaune took a deep breath, made his decision, and pressed the button.
121311211131121.title: Blake and Yang

choices: He manages to touch the remote.
He doesn't reach it in time.
He knocks the remote out of her hand.
1213112111311211.content:
Deciding to play it safe, Jaune went with a simple swap. He needed for Weiss to be unable to find fault in his selection. It had to be something obvious yet not sexual in the least. His finger hit the Body Part Swap option and selected hair. A second later, after a green flash, Jaune’s head felt heavier. He now had thick luscious black hair that reached down to his lower black. Blake on the other hand, had Ruby’s short black hair with red tips. Weiss eyed him up and down and then glanced between him and Blake.

“Hair was a good choice,” Weiss commented and Jaune felt warm at her praise. “I remember Yang telling Ruby she would look good with longer hair. It’s definitely true.”

“I don’t think short hair suits Blake though.” Jaune pointed out.

“No. No it doesn’t.” Weiss took the remote from Jaune and examined the buttons again. “It’s interesting how this works. It defies realty, yet still has rules.”

“You have to think about how powerful the inventor of this device is,” Jaune said. “Oh, let me write this down. After life swap, body swaps affect the life I’m in to others, even if I see myself in it.” He looked up and his blood froze.

Weiss was aiming the remote without Jaune touching it.

“Wait!” He cried, reaching out toward it.
1213112111311211.title: Small Cosmetic Change

choices: Weiss tells him what she swapped.
Weiss doesn't tell him.
Weiss lies to him about what she swapped.
12131121113112112.content:
Jaune was too late. Weiss’s hand jerked backward and he missed the remote by an inch. He didn’t see any flash of green light this time, so there was a chance Weiss didn’t press a button. Of course this was the first time he had been not touching the remote. A green flash would normally draw attention. Maybe the flash was only for the user? Either way, he grabbed the remote from Weiss’s hand.

“What are you doing?” Weiss hissed.

“You were going to swap without me,” Jaune hissed back.

“…were?” Weiss blinked and looked down. “I actually swapped. Can you notice any differences? I swapped with Yang if that helps you out.”

Jaune frowned. Leave it to Weiss to make a lapse of judgment into a learning experience. He eyed her up and down. She looked exactly the same as she always did. Long silver hair tied in a ponytail on one side, pale skin that almost made her look doll like, large breasts that never seemed to quite fit her frame, and a white dress that changed to a light blue. Everything was exactly like he remembered. Thinking he might get a better idea by comparing Yang, he looked back out the window.

Yang finally was getting through to Blake, who finally stood up. Jaune tried hard to figure out what changed with Yang. She had long blonde hair, a muscular body, was very tall but no breasts, and her gym wear seemed usual for her. All of that matched his memories. Finally giving up, he turned back to Weiss and shook his head.

“I can’t tell anything changed. That must have been what it was like for you finding our Ruby and I swapped.”

Weiss nodded ever so slightly, glad he understood her circumstance. The question now was if she was going to tell him what she swapped.
12131121113112112.title: He doesn't reach it in time.

choices: Swap with Weiss
Swap with someone else.
Hold off on swapping for now.
121311211131121122.content:
“I think we swapped enough with Blake and Yang,” Weiss stated, as her two teammates began to move out of sight. “Let’s find someone else who isn’t going anywhere to try a few swaps in a specific order. I’m curious about Body Swaps with Life Swaps.” She held out her hand for the remote.

Jaune didn’t immediately hand it over.

“What did you swap?” He asked.

“Nothing big,” Weiss stated, her face unreadable. “Come on.” Jaune still refused to give it to her and she rolled her eyes. “Fine. I forgot okay? I was a little over eager to test something and it worked. I told you I would tell you if you guessed correctly. This is also a test to see if a swap can be noticed. Reason it was something noticeable.”

“And I still can’t see it.” Jaune admitted.

“As a sign of good faith, I’ll let you hold on to it,” Weiss stated. “You wouldn’t try anything… ungentlemanly, would you?” She turned and started walking. Jaune quickly followed. He didn’t notice, but Weiss seemed to be in a slightly better mood and kept looking down at her impressive chest for a girl her size.

“No!” Jaune protested. “I’m interested in testing this remote out myself. It’s nice to have someone else to do it with. Ruby just wanted to try out living each other’s life.”

“Such a simple choice.” Weiss sighed. “I doubt she will do anything bad in your body. She probably wants to be treated as an adult for a little while.”

“You tend to call her a kid.”

“Only to help her grow mentally. She needs to fix some of her childish tendencies in order to be an affective team leader.” Weiss rubbed the bridge of her nose. “I… may have been a little harsh on her sometimes. I should apologize.” She looked up at him. “You may be tolerable if you quit that incessant flirting.”

Jaune felt a stab in his heart.

“Pass me the notes you have taken. I want to check something.”

Jaune handed her the notepad and there was a moment when she was distracted. He had the chance to swap something with her without her noticing. He could also swap with someone else. There were a few people in range. He could swap anything without her knowing as revenge for swapping something without him knowing. Of course, he could be a gentleman and not do anything. He pushed some of Blake’s hair out of his face. They never did swap hair back. There wasn’t much time to decide.
121311211131121122.title: Weiss Keeps It a Secret

choices: Weiss beleived she was Jaune in Ruby's life.
Weiss believed she was Ruby and remembered the swaps so far.
Weiss believed she was Ruby and doesn't remembered the swaps.
1213112111311211221.content:
Jaune was also curious about some of the properties of the remote. The instructions said that only the people touching the remote would be able to tell the swap happened. Even when Weiss used the remote, he knew the remote would work yet couldn’t see what changed. His memories were completely altered with the new reality. It was weird being on the opposite end of the remote. The question on his mind now was: what would happen if he swapped lives with Weiss? He would be living her life with her in his current life, Ruby’s. Would she remember everything? Would she only remember the swaps he knew about? Would she just believe herself to be Ruby or believe herself to be Jaune in Ruby’s life? So many questions. The temptation was too strong to ignore and Weiss made a swap without asking him.

All’s fair in love and war.

On a whim, he decided to use a Body and Life Swap right before his finger hit the button. There was a flash of green light and Jaune found his position swapped.

The first thing that happened was wobbled as he found himself wearing high heeled shoes. Weiss had a couple inches on her heels after all and a sudden change to them threw everything off balance. The next thing he noticed was how much shorter he felt. Jaune had always been tall and Weiss was rather petite. His clothes weren’t too much different that Ruby’s, as they both wore combat skirts. The fabric felt much smoother and finer though. The weight on his head was more to one side, a sign Weiss’s ponytail was on his head. He almost stumbled forward before righting himself back up. Again, experience saved him. Weiss’s breasts were really big for her size. The weight wanted to pull him forward. They were amazing and Jaune almost felt them before stopping himself.

He hadn’t realized yet Weiss had swapped her breasts with Yang.

The reason he stopped was because he heard Weiss move behind him. He turned around, hiding the remote inconspicuously in his skirt pocket. In front of him he saw himself, in Ruby’s clothes, with Blake’s long black hair. Weiss was in there and opened her… his?... mouth.
1213112111311211221.title: Revenge on Weiss

choices: Enjoy his time as Weiss with Ruby.
Keep using the remote.
His and Ruby's Scrolls ring.
12131121113112112213.content:
“Thanks for spending time with me, Weiss.” Weiss said in a combination of gratitude and happiness.

Jaune blinked in her body and stared at the person in front of him. He wasn’t sure if Weiss believed herself to be him in Ruby’s life or just Ruby. As she was not mentioning the remote and seemed to be referencing just them hanging out. She apparently didn’t recall the remote. Jaune had to take a shot in the dark and tried to let Weiss’s life chose his words.

“It’s only natural for partners to do things together, Ruby.” He said. “I’m glad for the chance to rub off on you.” Weiss in Ruby’s life rolled her eyes.

Okay, so the remote had put Weiss in Ruby’s life. Everyone except him would see her as Ruby, even though she had his body. This was going to take some getting used to. If Weiss acted like Ruby, it wouldn’t be too bad. He pretty much would be hanging out with his best friend, just in Weiss’s life. The remote allowed him to act like Weiss so no one would be able to tell anything was different. Now that the remote was safely in his possession, he had to decide what to do next. Naturally, living as Weiss for a while to learn more about her was the first thing on his mind. He was in the body of the most beautiful girl in Beacon to him. It was a dream come true.

Of course he felt a little guilty. The longer he stayed in her body, the more tempted he would be to take advantage of the situation. Part of him wanted to because he was a guy. The other half told him he would be scum if he did. Using the remote on someone, either switching back with Weiss or swapping something with someone else, would be a useful distraction. He could continue to experiment. The notepad in his other hand still had the notes he and Weiss had written so far.
12131121113112112213.title: Weiss becomes Ruby.

choices: A relaxing spa sounds like fun. Go along with it.
Decide a spa isn't for him and use the remote to get out of it.
Something else comes up.
121311211131121122133.content:
“Huh? A message from Yang?”

It took Jaune a moment to remember he was in Weiss’s life and body. He had just answered his Scroll automatically. From Weiss’s action in Ruby’s life, she also received the group message. Jaune figured it wouldn’t hurt to read it, since it was a team message and he was now part of their team. Yang had sent them a rather short message.

Found Blake! Meet back at the room and we can head to the Vale Spa.

Spa? Jaune thought. He vaguely remembered one opening up. It was mainly advertising a hot spring environment and massages. As someone with seven sisters, he was used to giving them massages. They helped relax the muscles and allowed faster recovery. He could feel Weiss shifting nervously next to him and he turned to her. “What is it, W-…Ruby?” He asked, correcting the name.

“I don’t really want to go, Weiss,” Weiss told him. “I don’t like people touching me.”

Now it all made sense. Ruby had wanted to swap lives and then ran off on him. She wanted to get out of this trip and the remote was a perfect opportunity. He didn’t doubt she would come back and want to try it out more once she was safe. In Weiss’s life, Jaune could feel himself wanting this trip. Two of his sisters always complained about neck and back pains because of their chests. Weiss being small with large breasts was bound to have the same problems. He could also tell how Weiss would treat Ruby’s complaints and thought he would have some fun with it.

“It’s beneficial for you to get one once in a while,” Jaune stated. “Running around and swinging that scythe of yours does call muscle fatigue. You can select a female masseuse so it won’t be awkward.”

“I guess,” Weiss grumbled and crossed her arms. “Yang said the same thing.” She stuck her tongue out and Jaune had to fight to hold back a laugh. Seeing his body act like Ruby and make expressions like that was hilarious. The two of them headed back to Team RWBY’s dorm, giving Jaune time to think about what to do next.

Something happens along the way.
Jaune decides he doesn't want to go and gets out of it with the remote.

“Hey!” Yang greeted them, as Jaune and Weiss/Ruby entered the dorm room. She had changed out of her work clothes. The new outfit consisted of a cream vest worn over a low cut black shirt; both are covered by a dark gray shrug with a raised collar. A black miniskirt was worn under the cream vest. She also wore black ankle boots and thigh high stockings. “Ready to go get pampered?”

https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/rwby...

Blake was sitting on her bed and looking resigned.

“Sound’s great,” Jaune told her. “My back’s been killing me.” He felt like leaning backwards with his hands pressed against his lower back. The movement accented Weiss’s body’s boobs. Yang scowled and Blake smirked.

“Haha.” Yang faked laugh. “You’re just jealous you can’t have a toned ass like mine.” Jaune only rolled his eyes. Yang was pretty sensitive about her small breasts.

“Do we have to?” Weiss asked. “I told you I’m not comfortable letting people touch my body.”

“It’s going to be fine, Ruby.” Yang threw her arm over Weiss’s shoulder. From Jaune’s point of view, Yang threw her arm over himself, as Weiss was in his body but living Ruby’s life. ‘It’s going to feel amazing and I’ll even be in the same room if it’s that big of a deal for you. Okay?”

“I guess…” Weiss shuffled her foot nervously. “If you promise.”

“What about you, Blake?” Jaune asked.

“I wouldn’t mind. My shoulders could use some work.” Blake shrugged. “At the very least, I want to relax in their hot springs.” Her eyes traveled over him. “I feel sorry for you through. Your back must hurt a lot. Being so developed yet with a small frame.” Jaune automatically scowled. Seemed Weiss’s life hated being called short.

“It’s something you learned to live with,” Jaune replied and Blake turned away. Noticing Yang was busy teasing Weiss, Jaune targeted Blake and swapped heights. He immediately felt himself shoot up a couple inches. Glancing in the mirror, while Weiss’s body still had a very prominent rack, her chest appeared a little more natural with her new height. Blake was now the shortest person on their team.

Finally, the four of them left and headed toward the Bullhead to reach Vale.
1213112111311211221331.title: Heading to the Spa

12131121113112112213311.content:
The four of them reached the Spa without any issue. Yang walked up confidently to the front desk and gave the receptionist the passes she had won. It didn’t take long for the manager to come out and greet them while congratulating Yang on winning their online contest. Jaune noted the man began to really suck up to him, once he was introduced. Always asking if there was anything special he would need. It seems the Schnee name was well known here. They entered through a door into a large changing room. Rows of white towels with the Spa’s symbol lined the walls and countless towels were piled up against the far wall, free for them to use. There were individual lockers for each of them to store personal possessions.

“This place is nice,” Jaune commented. “Very high class. I’m surprised you like these places, Yang.” Jaune felt Weiss’s life encouraging him to make that remark.

“Normally can’t afford something like this, Weissy,” Yang replied. “Doesn’t mean I don’t like to pamper myself.” She looked around. “So what’s first? The artificial hot spring they set up? Their site says you can’t tell the difference from a natural one. Maybe a massage? You even get to choose the masseuse you want. There are other things too, like pedicures and a mud bath. Pass is good for three hours so feel free to enjoy yourselves to the fullest.”

“I’m going to go enjoy the hot springs,” Blake said. “If it’s as good as they say, I may be there the entire time.”

“Umm… I’m going to go too.” Weiss stated in a very Ruby like way. She probably wanted to put off the massage as long as possible. Yang rolled her eyes, thinking the same thing.

“Sure. A soak would be good for the muscles.” Yang turned to Jaune. “What about you, Weiss?”
12131121113112112213311.title: Arrival at the Spa

121311211131121122133112.content:
“I think I’m going to get a massage first then relax in the hot spring,” Jaune decided.

He grabbed a towel and a robe along with the rest of them in the woman’s changing room. He felt slightly guilty about this, but excited at the same time. Managing to stand so brazening in the female dorm room was a dream many guys wish they could live. Yang and Blake were two of the hottest girls in his year at Beacon. Ruby was cute, but he wouldn’t look at his best friend like that. There was also the case of Weiss being in Ruby’s life along with being in his body.
