Once it landed, Jaune rushed to a trash can trying not to vomit.

It had been easy enough to slip into Vale. He told Ren he was off to check out a new issue of X-ray and Vav. That was a believable lie and Ren promised to pass on the message to the others. Jaune felt a little guilty lying, but it was better than trying to explain the remote. Only he and Ruby knew about it and it was probably best to leave it that way for now. Too many questions that could not be answered.

The sun was still up and it was a couple hours until dark. The streets of Vale were busy and Jaune just moved along with the crowd. Looking around, there were countless people he could swap with. From children to adults, Hunters and civilians, men and women, the choices were limitless. He moved off the main street, saw a couple clubs and the mall in the distance, before finally stopping and thinking about what to do.

His original goal was to swap with a Faunus and he could still go with that. Of course, he could scrap that idea or find someone else. Maybe check out the clubs beginning to open or the mall.
12131121131223232111213211213312232213.title: Find a Faunus in Vale.

choices: Jaune's able to get to the hotel.
It was too much trouble and Jaune decides to go somewhere else.
Something happens on the way.
121311211312232321112132112133122322131.content:
There was a part of Vale that was like 90% Faunus Jaune occasionally visited. They had a small market he could get some fruit native to his hometown that was harder to find at the regular supermarkets. A few of the shop owners knew him and. because he didn’t harbor any ill will to Faunus, they welcomed him. He walked down the streets along the familiar path and entered the shop.

“Hello, Jaune.” A kindly old man welcomed him. Once he stepped out from behind the counter, you could see a grey wolf tail. “Back so soon?”

“Nora was using them as target practice,” Jaune replied. Funny enough, this was true. Nora told him the way they exploded made it even more fun. The reason he was there just happened to be different this time. “How’s business?”

“Went down a little, but now that the White Fang is actually settling down and working with the Vale council on peace talks, it’s picking up again.”

“About time,” Jaune agreed. “We have the Grimm out there. There’s no reason for us to fight each other.”

“Tell that to the idiots on both sides.” The main sighed. He had lived a long like and saw a great many things. “At least Sienna Khan has realized that the violence was only causing more problems.”

“Sienna Kahn?” Jaune asked curiously.

“You know? The current leader of the White Fang?” The man looked at him incredulously.

“Sorry,” Jaune apologized. “Been stuck in Beacon doing a lot of training.”

“Ah. I suppose fighting Grimm does keep a young boy busy.”

“So this Sienna Kahn, is she still in the city?” Jaune asked, an inkling idea beginning to form. The White Fang did originate in Menagerie…. So maybe swapping with the current leader would be entertaining?

“Oh yeah, she’s bound to be returning to her hotel there.” He pointed toward a large building in the middle of Vale. “Lot of security, but she should be doing a press release shortly. You might be able to catch the end of it if you hurry.”

“I’ll do just that,” Jaune said, throwing some Lein on the counter. “Thanks for the fruit and info!”

“Come back anytime.” The main waved as Jaune dashed out.

Jaune ran through the city, making his way to the hotel. If he could just get a clean shot of this Sienna Kahn person, he could make a swap. Though, if she’s really a high profile celebrity type person, maybe it would be better to go after someone else.
121311211312232321112132112133122322131.title: Stick to the Plan.

choices: The press conference was held outside.
The press conference was held inside, but in a public venue
The press conference was held in a private venue.
1213112113122323211121321121331223221311.content:
Rushing through Vale during the middle of rush hour wasn’t easy.

Jaune was careful not to play through anyone, but he did accidentally bump into countless people in the crowd. There were several rude gestures, which he ignored. It had been his fault after all. The closer he got to the hotel, the more people there were. It was in the middle of the city, so the main roads were here. He waited for traffic to stop so he could cross the street and during that time, tried to see what was going on. There were a lot of cars and people outside the building, but he was too far away to tell what exactly was happening.

Shit, Jaune thought. I hope it’s not being held inside the hotel. That’s going to make getting close difficult.

If the press conference was held outside, Jaune could easily get close enough to swap. If it was inside the hotel, he would have to find the venue and pray it was open to the public. If it was in a private conference room, security wouldn’t let him anywhere nearby. His hand clutched the remote in his pocket.

Luckily, he had options if it came to that.

The light changed and Jaune crossed the street.
1213112113122323211121321121331223221311.title: Jaune's able to get to the hotel.

choices: Jaune performs a Body Swap.
Someone bumps Jaune, causing him to hit a different button.
A fight breaks out, causing chaos.
1213112113122323211121321121331223221311.content:
Things could have been worse, Jaune thought to himself as he entered the hotel.

The venue was public and though he had to wait in a long line to get a seat, he was able to get in. Surprisingly, being a Hunter-in-Training was actually a benefit. The person checking ID and making sure they didn’t bring any contraband actually looked impressed the younger generation was taking an interest in politics. Jaune entered the room and looked around as he took a seat in the back. He wasn’t lucky or important enough to get a close seat.

The front of the room was what he imagined it to be. There was a podium with tables on either side. Reporters and cameras were set up in the first few rows. Behind them were the wealthier looking individuals. Behind those people were everyone else who bothered to come. A quick glance told Jaune there were a great many Faunus here looking and chattering eagerly. The rich folks looked a little uncomfortable and the amount of police presence leaning against walls and waiting by doors was probably stationed there for their protection.

“…we were forced to turn to violence to gain attention,” the young female currently at the podium was saying. “Some of us took it too far. We do not desire a war against the humans; we only fight for equality…”

The woman was Sienna Khan.

Sienna was a female, Bengal tiger-based Faunus with orange eyes, dark complexion and wild black, chin-length hair with an asymmetrical bob style. Her Faunus trait manifested as an extra pair of ears, and her body was adorned with numerous tattoos resembling tiger stripes.[2] She wore four golden earrings on three of her ears, one each on her Human ears, and two on her left Faunus ear as well as a small jewel on her forehead.

She was seen wearing a form-fitting black dress with light green accents on the rims of the outfit; the dress left most of her back open, had two long splits on the side which revealed a pair of black shorts. Over the dress, she wore a back-revealing red cape with gold accents, as well as a green waist cincher with red rims that had a black belt over it, which fastened a green pouch on her right hip. Aside from that, she wore black stockings in conjunction with green sandals that had red laces which were tied to her calves, as well as a black elbow length fingerless glove on her right hand.

https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/rwby...

Jaune was temporarily captive by the woman’s voice and passion, before he shook his head and pulled out the remote. He had the perfect opportunity to swap with her. She wasn’t walking around so the distance wasn’t going to be a problem. His goal was to swap bodies with her and he carefully aimed to make sure he hit his target.
1213112113122323211121321121331223221311.title: Jaune meets Sienna

choices: Swap with Pyrrha
Swap with Nora
Wait until tomorrow.
1213112113122323211121321121331223221311.content:
One green flash of light later, Jaune had to hide a snicker as he saw himself standing up on stage talking passionately about Faunus rights. The reason it was so funny was because he saw himself up there wearing Sienna’s black dress and accessories. He tried to keep a straight face though, because he didn’t want people to think he was laughing at her. Now that the swap was done, it was time to go, but he couldn’t leave just yet. The room was crowded and he had just arrived. It would be suspicious.

So he had to sit there for over an hour listening to her talk about Faunus rights and taking questions.

It wasn’t that he didn’t like Faunus rights. Jaune actually supported them. It’s just when you live near Blake, you heard a lot of the talking points already. The violence against Faunus was an issue and Jaune swore he would help anyone he saw getting bullied, human or Faunus. While he was there, he figured he might as well listen and learn.

Another benefit he had, now that he possessed Sienna’s body, was the fact he had a new set of ears. It was like Ruby had mentioned to him before when she swapped with Velvet. You could hear so much more and even small background sounds were noticeable. It took a little bit of time to get used to some of the people shouting and he flinched when someone near him yelled suddenly.

At long last, Sienna stepped down and some of the people began to leave. Jaune followed their example and left. He wasn’t too worried about his body. Sienna had a number of guards and was a high profile person. It was getting late and Jaune had to hurry back to Beacon. Ruby was supposed to meet up with him early in the morning before they left to swap with Yang.

On the way back to Beacon, Jaune did take the opportunity to admire his new body. Sienna was fit and flexing revealed how acrobatic she was. It kind of reminded him of Blake and Pyrrha in that regard. Agile fighters rather than brute force users like Yang and Cardin. He pulled back the sleeves of his hoody and revealed more stripe tattoos on his skin. A ghost of wind hit him and he reached up to brush some of his new black hair out of his eyes. Night began to fall and he could still see perfectly fine, even in areas with less lighting.

Faunus night vision was handy.

Jaune finally made it back to his room and saw the rest of his team already there.

“Welcome back,” Ren said and noticed Jaune’s arms were empty. “Did they not have the issue you were looking for?”

“Er... no.” Jaune replied, thinking fast. “I must have misread the notice online. They were only taking pre orders and it’s not coming in until later this month.”

Ren nodded in understanding.

“You should be more careful, Jaune-Jaune,” Nora replied, looking up from her bed. She was wearing a tight black shirt with the word ‘boop’ on it in white, with the second o in pink. Pink booty shorts with white dots finished her PJ ensemble. “Pyrrha was getting worried.”

“Sorry. I was delayed because I stopped by to listen to Sienna Khan give a speech about Faunus rights.” Jaune answered.

“The current leader of the White Fang?” Pyrrha asked, turning to him. She had been brushing her hair while wearing a white tank top with red booty shorts of her own. “I didn’t know you were interested in politics.”

“Well, you know Oobleck’s been giving us assignments about current events right?” Jaune asked, glad he had a valid excuse to give. “If he assigns us another one as a surprise again, I’ll be ready.”

“Wow.” Pyrrha looked impressed. “I’m really proud of you taking the initiative, Jaune.”

“Thanks, Pyr.” Inside, Jaune felt like garbage as he was lying to her face. He promised to make it up for them.

“That’s our fearless leader for you,’ Nora said to Ren. “I can’t wait for his next team outing.”

“Neither can I,” Ren agreed. “They always turn into something interesting.”

As Jaune got ready for bed, he realized something as he changed into his own pajamas. It wasn’t Sienna’s naked body that distracted him though. She was hot, don’t get him wrong. It was just he had seen several naked girls bodies recently and learned to control himself a bit. It was just her body reminded him of something. He mentally kicked himself for forgetting.

He should have swapped wardrobes with Sienna.

His previous experience with body swapping should have told him that. It didn’t bother him now, but eventually he would need a bra, not to mention other clothes like swim suits. Menagerie was an island nation. His eyes traveled to Nora and Pyrrha. They were the two optimal choices. Nora’s clothes consisted of a lot of white and pink outfits, while Pyrrha had a lot of red. Either would work. If he swapped tonight, he would be all ready for tomorrow. If he waited, there might be a window of opportunity to swap with someone else.
1213112113122323211121321121331223221311.title: Jaune Becomes the Tiger

choices: Ruby comes knocking early next morning.
Jaune goes and sees Ruby the next morning.
Jaune wakes up in the middle of the night.
1213112113122323211121321121331223221311.content:
He remembered Sienna wore darker clothes, so Jaune decided to try a different route.

A quick swap and he found himself in Nora’s black boop shirt and tight pink short shorts. Nora on the other hand was now writing in her notebook wearing Jaune’s sweatshirt and jeans. Jaune took a moment to glance down at his skin. His tanned legs had the black tattoo stripes too. They weren’t restricted to his arms. He felt the restrictiveness of Nora’s bra on his chest and adjusted it slightly. Sienna had an average size chest, but Nora had a pretty impressive, if you didn’t compare it to Yang. The swap adjusted the clothes, but the position had been off slightly.

Jaune slumped back into the bed and he saw Nora get up. He found it interesting that Nora had originally changed into pajamas, but was now changing into Jaune’s blue Pumpkin Pete onesie out of her part of the closet. She did change in the bathroom and then jumped on her beg.

“Nora,” Ren admonished. “Please try to avoid doing that. If the strings break, you won’t be able to sleep comfortably.”

“Pssh.” Nora waved him off. “As long as I got my onsie, I’ll be comfortable and warm anywhere I go.”

“It is kind of cute,” Pyrrha admitted. “I’m surprised you ate enough boxes of cereal to win one of those.”

“This is Nora,” Ren reminded her. “She won it in a contest for eating cereal.”

“It’s not as good as pancakes,” Nora added. “Sorry, Pyrrha. I know you were their mascot for a bit, but that cereal wasn’t very good.”

“It wasn’t very healthy either.” Pyrrha agreed.

Jaune laughed quietly to himself and talked with his teammates late into the night. Since he was going off with Ruby’s team tomorrow morning, he wouldn’t see them for a few days. Team JNPR had always been close, like a family. Ren the quiet one, Nora the crazy fun one, Pyrrha the polite yet unbeatable one, and Jaune, their leader. Why he was made a leader still escaped him. Still, he was glad to have met them all. Everyone began to fall asleep and Jaune quietly waited until he heard the familiar noises indicating they were really asleep.

His hand began to reach down between his legs and began to massage his slit.

Seeing Sienna’s naked body turned him on and it took a lot of self-control to avoid doing something at that time. Now that he was wearing tight form fitting clothes he stole from Nora, he could see how sexy Sienna looked. He couldn’t help himself. Two fingers entering were all it took and Jaune shoved his other hand into his mouth as he came. Smiling to himself, he fell asleep almost immediately afterwards.
1213112113122323211121321121331223221311.title: Boop Tiger

choices: Swap lives with Yang.
Swap teams with Yang
They suddenly come up with a different idea.
1213112113122323211121321121331223221311.content:
The following Saturday morning, there wasn’t anything that required their immediate attention, so Team JNPR had a lazy morning. Nora had woken them up early and they were playing cards while taking turns in the shower. She was wearing a black low cut shirt with red trim and a long crimson skirt. Jaune was currently wearing a pink shirt with a white heart on the front and a white skirt. It was something simple he found in his wardrobe. A knock on their door interrupted their game, and Jaune jumped to his feet.

“I got it!”

Opening the door he saw the person he expected, Ruby.

“Ready?” She asked.

“I almost forgot I promised to help Ruby with something real fast before her team leaves,” Jaune called over his shoulder. A little white lie wouldn’t hurt. “I’ll be back in a couple minutes.” Pyrrha nodded and Nora waved to him, so he was given the go ahead. Shutting the door behind him, he turned to Ruby. “So, same plan or you have something different in mind? I know we plan for me to take Yang’s place, but how do we want to do this.”

“Life would make everyone see you as her, right?” Ruby muttered and Jaune nodded. “It would be weird to see you as a girl, but it might make things go smoother if all of us are girls.”

“But then your team would all have to change in front of me,” Jaune reminded her. This was actually a little funny, as he had a female body, but everyone still saw him as a boy. It wasn’t like he still had a dick. “While the rest of your team won’t notice, you would. If we use a Personal Information Swap, then it would be like I was part of your team the entire time. Blake and Weiss would consider a guy being on the team as normal and I would be able to change and sleep separately.”

“It might be a little weird to have you and Weiss on the same team,” Ruby pointed out. “With your attempts to court her in all.” She grinned as Jaune looked embarrassed.

“I still think she’s beautiful,” Jaune admitted. “But I’m going to respect her wishes that she doesn’t feel that way about me.”

“That’s really mature of you.” Ruby complimented.

“You say that,” Jaune reminded her. “Right before we use a reality changing remote to get rid of your sister for a friend so you can have fun and don’t have to listen to puns.”

“I didn’t say I was mature.” Ruby protested.

“Then you should drink more milk.”

That got Jaune elbowed in the side.

“So whatever we decide.” He continued. “Just make sure both of us are touching the remote." Ruby nodded and went back into her room to get Yang.
1213112113122323211121321121331223221311.title: Ruby comes knocking early next morning.

choices: They make it to the Bullhead without incident and then arrive at the docks.
They meet someone on the way to the Bullhead.
An issue occurs before they get to the docks.
1213112113122323211121321121331223221311.content:
Jaune waved to Yang as she passed and Ruby snuck over to him when she had her back turn. Jaune and Ruby grasped the remote tightly as Jaune hit the Personal Info Swap button. There was a flash of green light and then nothing. Jaune and Ruby looked at each other. Nothing seemed to have changed and neither of them felt different. Until Yang turned to address them.

By address, she ran forward and wrapped Ruby in a bear hug.

“My little sister is going off on her own without me for days,” Yang said, as Ruby struggled to get out. “Don’t get into trouble while I’m done.”

“Gettoff!” Ruby yelled into Yang’s chest before finally escaping. “I’m not on my own. I’m with my team.”

“One of them is a boy,” Yang reminded her and then turned to Jaune. She put an arm over his shoulder. “Listen, I know you wouldn’t take advantage of Ruby, but I have to threaten you with bodily harm if you do. It’s a sister thing.”

“It’s cool. I have seven of them too. We are friends and the trips more for Blake to meet her family.” Jaune felt nothing but relief when Yang let go. It wasn’t like he still had his original body. Sienna was a full blown female, not that Yang could tell. In her eyes, he was still Jaune. A boy and close friend with Ruby.

“Okay, make sure to take plenty of pictures. I want to know all about the trip.” After Ruby promised her, Yang walked into Jaune’s old room.

“That was… weird?” Jaune said to Ruby.

“Did it just swap rooms or…” Ruby trailed off as they entered her room.

Her question was immediately answered.

Most of the room looked the same, but Yang’s bed above Blake’s had a bright pink trunk that was packed with clothes that Jaune recognized as Nora. The nearby desk had all of Jaune’s books, notebooks, and magazines. He only swapped clothes with Nora after all. Ruby realized all of Yang’s stuff was gone and as far as she remembered, Jaune had always been a male with a female body, tanned skin, tiger ears, stripe tattoos, and a tendency to wear white, pink, and orange clothes.

“About time!” Weiss snapped at them, causing them to jump from her surprise appearance. Jaune’s tiger ears slammed against his head at the sudden noise. They were so sensitive. “We need to get going.”

“We have to catch the Bullhead in… 30 minutes.” Blake informed them.

“So last call to make sure you dolts are packed.”

Ruby and Jaune shared a look before rushing to their luggage. There would be plenty of time to talk about what happened.
1213112113122323211121321121331223221311.title: Jaune Joins Team RWBY

choices: Explore on his own.
Follow Ruby and Weiss.
Go and see Blake. She's your partner now.
1213112113122323211121321121331223221311.content:
Jaune was lucky his luggage was already packed. A quick check showed all the clothes, his hygiene kit, and other person items, like comic books, were already packed. Yang must have been about done and when the remote swapped them, it had been if Jaune packed. As he zipped up the pink trunk and followed the others, he began to see flashes of memories from during their time living together and initiation.

Ruby caught his eye and snickered and he figured she was experiencing the same memories.

Jaune was now Blake’s partner and their first meeting hadn’t been ideal, but it could have been worse. Blake had stumbled him stuck to the tree by Pyrrha’s spear and unlocked his aura. She didn’t speak a lot to him still, but they had conversations in this reality. Blake finally began to open up and he was learning she was quite funny when she wanted to be. She and Ruby had at least shared a laugh at Jaune’s pitiful attempt to flirt with Weiss.

All in all, the memories showed their relationship was pretty similar to his old team.

Only difference was a couple times either he walked in on or someone walked in on him in the bathroom.

It was usually his fault.

The Bullhead was a short ride to Vale, but it didn’t make it any less comfortable for Jaune. He still had motion sickness. Swapping bodies with Sienna didn’t fix that. As much as Ruby liked him, she sat far away from in along with Weiss. Blake had joined them, though that was more to protect her book in her hand. He didn’t blame them. Not after the first meeting he had with Ruby and Yang, giving him the nickname Vomit Boy. He closed his eyes and that helped a little. Weiss and Ruby were talking excitedly and Blake occasionally explained something about Menagerie.

He figured he would have to catch up later.

The boat they transferred too was rather large, but it wasn’t a giant ship by any means. It was designed with enough weapons to defeat the occasional Grimm and travel the seas from Vale to Menagerie. The first thing the four of them did was check in and find their room and drag their luggage in.

“It’s kind of small.” Weiss said immediately.

“Sorry it’s not a luxury cruise,” Blake replied curtly. “There are only a few ships willing to travel to Menagerie.”

“That’s not… I mean…” Weiss stammered.

Blake chuckled and the tension dropped.

“I know what you mean, but we are only going to be on here for a day. At least there are four beds and they all have mattresses.”

“That would suck if they were just canvas.” Jaune agreed.

“Learned from experience?” Blake asked.

“Yeah…” Jaune rubbed the back of his head. “Having some work done on the house and we had to adjust. My room was unlivable so I slept on the floor while my sister got the couch. A sleeping bag isn’t much support if you don’t have some kind of padding.”

“You’re a much better older sibling then Yang is,” Ruby complimented. “She would have stolen the couch immediately.”

“I’m so glad she’s not on our team,” Weiss said. “Sorry, Ruby. Her jokes are insufferable.”

“You have no idea.” Ruby replied and caught Jaune’s eye. He had to hold back a chuckle.

Weiss missed it, but Blake’s eyes darted between the two of them. She knew something happened between them.

“Now that we are settled in, it’s time to explore the ship!” Ruby declared. “Come on, Weiss.”

“Wait, you dolt!” Weiss cried out, but to no avail. Ruby grabbed her wrist and pulled the poor girl after her. Jaune and Blake chuckled at her expression before she vanished from sight.

“I think I’m going to get some fresh air on deck.” Blake informed Jaune before heading out.

Now Jaune had to decide what to do.
1213112113122323211121321121331223221311.title: Onward to Menagerie

choices: Jaune and Blake go looking for the other two.
Jaune goes looking for them.
Ruby and Weiss make it up to the deck.
1213112113122323211121321121331223221311.content:
Weirdly enough, Jaune found himself wanting to go meet Blake.

He supposed it was because in this reality he was Blake’s partner. While he joined the team due to Ruby’s request, it wasn’t like this was their first time hanging out. She was going to treat him like normal. They were friends on a trip. Who knows? Maybe they might decide to make this a permanent thing. He might as well treat it like it was always the case until he and Ruby find another use for it. He locked the room behind him and headed toward the deck.

It didn’t take long to find Blake.

She was leaning against the rails as the ship began to depart. A few other passengers were milling around, but most were probably below deck in their room. Jaune walked over to her and, instead of saying anything, just leaned up against the rail next to her. The salty sea breeze felt nice and he just relaxed. He could feel Blake stiffen next to him but relaxed the moment she realized he wasn’t forcing her to talk. Minutes passed and Jaune lost track of how long the two of them were standing there. Part of him believed he heard Ruby and Weiss shouting below deck a couple of times.

“I left Menagerie without letting my parents know.” Blake said suddenly.

“What for?” Jaune asked.

“To join the White Fang,” Blake answered in a low voice. “Back when they were peaceful. Then once things started getting bad, I left for Beacon. I wasn’t sure when I would go back home, if ever.”

“You’re going back now.” Jaune pointed out.

“That’s… probably because of you and Ruby… and a little of Weiss.” Blake replied and actually let out a soft laugh. “The three of you… really helped me open up. Ruby’s innocence, your loyalty, and Weiss’s acceptance of who I really am.” She sighed and reached up to the bow on her head and slowly untied it. “If I’m going back home, I won’t need this.”

“If it helps, I think you look better without it.” Jaune offered.

Blake rolled her eyes, but she was definitely smiling.

“Thank you.” There was a pause. “If you’re that good at pickup lines, what happened with your attempts courting Weiss?”

“What… that was completely different. I wasn’t trying to pick you up… very funny.” He noticed the amused look on her face and she laughed.

“Just a little joke,” she assured him. “My mom will probably like you. Especially Ruby. My dad is a little… intense, but he’s still very kind.”

“Please tell me you made sure to let him know we are just friends.” Jaune begged.

“Maybe~.”

“Very funny.”

“I’m hilarious.” The fact she could say that with a straight face and somewhat of a monotone actually made it funny. “I’m still a little worried about Weiss here though.”

“Because of her family?” Jaune asked.

“Yes.” Blake nodded. “A lot of Faunus don’t like the Schnee family and some may blame her for what her father did. You and Ruby might experience some fallout too, for associating with her and being humans.” She turned and looked at the ears on his head. “You might be able to pass as a Faunus due to your ears. Ruby won’t.”

Jaune made a mental note that while that knew him knew he was a human, Sienna’s body might cause confusion to others. This could be a blessing and a curse.

“We’ll be fine,” Jaune assured her. He could tell that’s what she wanted. “Anyone who meets Ruby will become her friend. Once you get past the socially awkward part.”

“Like how I got use to you.”

“Again, very funny.”

The two of them talked a bit longer before Jaune began to wonder where Ruby and Weiss were.
1213112113122323211121321121331223221311.title: Go and see Blake. She's your partner now.

choices: Ruby takes Blake's cat ears.
Ruby swaps clothes with Weiss.
Ruby decides on a Personal Info/Personality swap.
1213112113122323211121321121331223221311.content:
“Sheesh, Ruby.” Weiss’s voices caused Jaune and Blake to turn to see their teammates approaching. “It’s just a boat.”

“I know, but you should always check the ship out when you first get on.” Ruby protested. “You have to know where everything is so you don’t get lost.”

Weiss rolled her eyes.

“Enjoyed your adventure?” Jaune asked.

“It was what you would expect.’ Weiss sighed.

“It was awesome and Weiss really enjoyed the engine room,” Ruby answered. “She never got a chance to see it before being in a first class cabin all the time.”

“Ruby!” Weiss cried out.

Blake and Jaune laughed. The four of them talked a bit more than Blake and Weiss went to talk about something in private. This let Jaune and Ruby catch up.

“Enjoying the trip so far/” Ruby asked.

“Ruby… we haven’t even gotten the Menagerie yet.” Jaune reminded her.

“…Right. Hehe.” Ruby tapped her head. “I just really want my best friends to have fun.” She tilted her head. “So what were you and Blake doing?”

“Talking.” Jaune shrugged. “In this reality, seems like you and I really helped Blake come out of her shell. So she and I are pretty close.”

“Close?” Ruby looked worried for a moment. “How so?”

“More like she confesses in me about things.” Jaune shrugged. “I assume it’s probably similar to what she and Yang shared.”

“Oh.” Jaune still didn’t notice Ruby seemed to be down about something. “It probably helps that even though you’re human, you have tiger ears.”

“That… did come up.” Jaune confirmed. “Soooo… did you want to use the remote? Have a little fun on the boat ride?”

“You’re the best!” Ruby hugged him. “So what should I swap? I’m thinking something with Blake or Weiss. Everyone else is a stranger except you, and we swapped a lot of stuff already.”

“What were you thinking of swapping?” Jaune asked.

“I don’t know?” Ruby stared at their friends across the boat. “Maybe Blake’s ears? We could match then.”

“You’ve tried Faunus ears already,” Jaune reminded her. “How about taking Weiss’s clothes? You could practice using heels.”

“Ewww.” They both laughed. “What if we try something more intangible? Like a personality or persona info swap?”

“Hmm.” Jaune rubbed his chin. “They can have some unexpected consequences, but if I don’t swap and can watch you, sure.”

What does Ruby decide on?
1213112113122323211121321121331223221311.title: Ruby and Weiss make it up to the deck.

choices: They arrive at Menagerie without problems.
A Grimm attacks during the trip.
Follow Jaune and Ruby on the boat a bit more.
1213112113122323211121321121331223221311.content:
“I think I want to wait until we are in a more private setting for a Personality or Info Swap,” Ruby mumbled shyly. “Even though I know the other people won’t notice a difference… it’s just a little unnerving.”

“It’s fine.” Jaune assured her. “It’s your choice.”

“I think I’m going to swap with Weiss,” Ruby stated firmly. “She never lets me try out her clothes and you got to try them out when you were living her life.”

“That was… awkward.” They both laughed. “Yeah, I think I will. She may wear lady stilts, but that’s part of the challenge.”

“Uh-huh.” Jaune mumbled, amused, as Ruby aimed the remote with his hand on it.

There was a flash of light and Ruby was wearing Weiss’s white and blue dress, along with her high heel boots. Immediately, Ruby stumbled and Jaune grabbed her arm to stabilize her. Jaune took the opportunity to glance over at Blake and Weiss. Weiss was now wearing Ruby’s red and black gothic style dress and combat boots, along with her signature red cape.

“Stupid stilts.” Ruby mumbled.

“Anything else?” Jaune asked.

“I can feel the ocean breeze over my legs a lot more,” Ruby commented, looking herself over and then straighter the tiara on her head that use to belong to Weiss. Ruby usually wore really tall black stockings “Luckily it’s not cold out.”

“Welcome to the world of skirts.” Jaune told her, not that he didn’t find out that a little while ago. He was wearing Nora’s clothes now. His skirt was just a simple white one, while Ruby now had Weiss’s expensively designed one. “Plus, heading south helps a lot.”

“And my chest is a little cooler, she should cover up more.” Ruby suddenly went red when she realized she was talking to Jaune. “Eep! Forget I said anything.”

“Forget what?” Jaune asked, smirking.

“That… Ah, you’re such a doofus, Vomit Boy.” She punched his shoulder playfully.

“Not as big as you Crater Face.” Jaune replied.

“Thanks for being my friend, Jaune.” Ruby said seriously. “I mean it. You helped me build confidence when I enter Beacon. I don’t think I would be able to have talked to Weiss if I hadn’t met you first.”

“Anytime.” Jaune assured her and gave her a won arm hug. He didn’t notice how red Ruby’s face became. She still saw him as male, just with a female tiger Faunus body.
1213112113122323211121321121331223221311.title: Ruby swaps clothes with Weiss.

choices: Both of Blake's parents were home.
Only Blake's mom was home.
Only Blake's dad was home.
1213112113122323211121321121331223221311.content:
“Man, it’s hot here.” Jaune complained, pulling at his the pink shirt he was wearing.

“You’ll get used to it,” Blake told him. “I did tell you all to dress light.”

“I feel like some people are watching us.” Weiss muttered.

Jaune noticed that too. Though, they were mainly looking at Weiss, with some at Ruby. No one seemed initially hostile, but if they were directed at him, it would be uncomfortable to say the least. Maybe it was what Blake mentioned back on the ship. She was a Faunus and he looked like a Faunus, so at a distance people would think he was one.

“Ignore them,” Ruby said and spread her arms wide. “Look at how cool this place is. The water’s crystal clear, lots of beaches, tropical fruit stalls everywhere. I want to see it all.” Walking around at night in Weiss’s heels finally got her use to them. She was able to keep up at least.

“I’ll make sure you give you a tour, Ruby.” Blake promised as they made their way to town. “Bet you don’t know which one of the houses is mine.”

“The big one up on the hill?” Jaune teased.

Blake faced him immediately, with her mouth open.

“How did you know?”

“Really?” Jaune gaped back. “It’s the big one?”

“Wow, Blake,” Ruby gasped. “You never told us you were rich.”

“I always wondered how you afforded all those books,” Weiss muttered to herself. “That makes sense.”

“We aren’t rich,” Blake told them, her cheeks slightly red. “Just well off. My dad’s…. the chief.”

“Ah political figure.” Weiss nodded her head. “Wealthy, but not rich. You can afford a lot of stuff, but nothing everything.” Blake nodded.

“What are your parents like?” Ruby asked, as they drew near the house.

“My dad’s rather large,” Blake described. “He can be kind of intimidating, especially since he doesn’t talk a lot. He’s nice though and unless you really do something wrong, he’s not going to hate you. My mom is… intrusive.”

“Intrusive?” Ruby and Weiss asked.

“Oooo.” Jaune flinched. “I got a sister like that. She’s going to want to know everything that happened and try to show us baby pictures isn’t she?” Blake nodded and looked at the ground.

“Blake as a baby,” Ruby squeaked. “I bet she was adorable.”

“I can’t wait to see either.” Weiss agreed.

Blake glared at them and Jaune winked at her, earning him a glare. He tried to act sorry and the ears on his head flattened. They reached the house and Blake sighed. She reached up and used the large metal knocker.
1213112113122323211121321121331223221311.title: They arrive at Menagerie without problems.

choices: Blake ushers them to her room.
They take a break in the living room.
Ruby's too excited to sit still and they go out to see the city a bit.
1213112113122323211121321121331223221311.content:
The door creaked opened.

“Blake? Did you finally arrive?”

Jaune stared at the woman who opening the door. At first glance, this woman was obviously related to Blake. As a cat Faunus with black hair and yellow eyes, she shares several physical features with Blake, although her ears were noticeably larger in size and had more fur details. She had short hair and three gold piercings on her cat ears; two on her right, and one on her left. She wore a black hakama and sandals with white tabi socks. Over her outfit, she wore a black shrug with a long right sleeve and a short left sleeve, gold leaf trim adorning the opening on the front.

https://images.app.goo.gl/B56KnTyvp1j57E...

“Blake! It is you!” The woman ran forward and wrapped her arms around her. “It’s so good to see you. I wasn't sure when you would arrive.”

"You never told us you had a sister," Jaune said to Blake before he could stop himself. Blake turned and looked at him in bewilderment. Weiss face palmed and Ruby giggled. The woman looked at him too and he began to see some age lines on her face. Even though she looked fit, age was hard to fight. Her expression on the other hand changed quickly from surprise to excitement.

“Oh… I like him.” She whispered to Blake, who flushed.

Jaune had heard every word too with his enhanced hearing and was equally embarrassed.

“Mom!” Blake hissed.

“Now, dear. Let me meet your friends.” The woman zipped past Blake to shake Jaune’s hand. “I’m Kali Belladonna, Blake’s mother. You can call me Kali. You must be Jaune Arc. Blake’s told me all about you. Though, she didn’t mention how proficient you are at flattery.”

“That was luck,” Jaune replied sheepishly, rubbing the back of his head. “I usually shove my foot in my mouth.”

“Nonsense, Blake had only good things about you.” Kali reassured him. “I’m glad someone can stand up to my daughter’s stubbornness.” She smiled. “It’s nice to know she had a partner she can count on.”

“Mooom!” Blake complained as Kali emphasized the word.

“Hello, Kali.” Weiss introduced. “I’m Weiss Schnee. It’s a pleasure to meet you and thank you for allow us to visit.”

“It was no problem, dear.” Kali gave her a hug. “I really wanted to meet you all and see Blake again. Has she grown out of the habit of running away before explaining herself?”

“Er…” Weiss wasn’t sure how to respond to that now.

“Mooooom!” Blake was now obviously embarrassed.

“And you must be Ruby!” Kali continued, moving onto the last member of their team. Even Ruby’s speed couldn’t react in time and she was trapped by the woman’s embrace. “I saw a picture, but you are even cuter than I recall. And so talented too. Getting into Beacon two years early.”

“It’s… nice to meet you too,” Ruby gasped. “Thank you for letting us crash here for a few days.”

“Again, it was my pleasure.” Kali assured her, before letting her go. “Come in, come in, everyone.” She started gesturing them inside. “You must be tired from your trip. Would you like to unpack, explore a bit? Maybe have a snack?”

Blake could only follow silently, her face a deep crimson.
1213112113122323211121321121331223221311.title: Only Blake's mom was home.

choices: Ruby swaps lives with Blake
Ruby swaps moms with Blake
Ruby swaps lives with Kali. (She wants to be a dotting mother.)
1213112113122323211121321121331223221311.content:
“I’ll have snacks out in just a minute,” Kali assured them. “I’m so happy to meet all of Blake’s friends.”

“Please, mom.” Blake begged. “It’s not that big of a deal.”

“Coming from the girl who ran away for months and only just finally got in touch.” Kali reprimanded before disappearing into the kitchen.

Blake’s ears dropped and her face flushed.

“Not a word,” she hissed at Weiss, Ruby, and Jaune.

“I wasn’t saying anything.” Weiss replied, but her expression screamed a smug, ‘I told you so.’ Jaune only shook his head at her.

“I’m surprised the living room is so clean,” Ruby said, changing the subject. “Back home, it’s a mess.”

“Isn’t that mostly due to Yang?” Jaune asked.

“Well, yeah. But dad has a lot of his tools and stuff lying around.”

“Maybe you should get Yang to pick up after herself,” Weiss pointed out. “I’ve seen their room when I go and talk to Pyrrha, and her bed is a mess.”

“Well… it’s just my mom and dad here,” Blake said. “And my mom takes care of the house, so there’s not a lot to do.”

“Well, it’s a nice place and I enjoy the decoration.” Weiss said. “Do you mind if I see the back yard for a few minutes while we wait for your mother?”

“Go ahead,” Blake answered. “We have a small garden and some flower beds you might enjoy. Mom would be happy to explain what they are.”

“Thank you.” Weiss got up and went out the back.

“Your mom seems nice.” Jaune commented.

“Arg…” Blake rubbed her face with her hands. “She means well, but she’s so embarrassing. Always wants to talk about me and my embarrassing baby moments.”

“You’re lucky to have a mom who’s there for you.” Ruby muttered.

“There have been times I wish she hadn’t,” Blake groaned and she missed Ruby stiffening up. “She kept contacting me not to get involved in the White Fang and as a kid would always try to show me off to the neighbors. It’s one of the reasons I didn’t let her know I got accepted to Beacon. She would either have contacted me constantly or would keep showing up unannounced.”

“She just cares about you and is probably proud of the way your turned out.” Jaune assured her

“When she shows my baby pictures, I wish she didn’t.” Blake didn’t look up from her hands on the table. “I told her to stop, but she keeps doing it.”

“Can I use your bathroom?” Ruby asked suddenly, standing up.

“Second floor, two doors to the right.” Blake directed and frowned when Ruby left. “She seemed angry?”

“Ruby doesn’t have a mom, remember?” Jaune reminded her and Blake’s eyes widened.

“Oh, shit… and I was just complaining…” Blake stood up. “I have to apologize…”

“Hang on,” Jaune said stopping her. “Let me, handle her. She’s probably a little upset. I know you don’t hate your mom, you love her a lot.” Blake nodded. “There have been times when I talk bad about my parents too, it’s not new, but to Ruby, she never got to know her mom. I think… you showing her how much your mom means to you will help heal, and then you can apologize and elaborate. I’ll calm her down a bit first, assure her this isn’t serious. Okay?”

Blake hesitated and nodded slowly.

“Thanks.” She whispered and hugged him quickly, before turning around to help her mom in the kitchen.

“Ruby?” Jaune asked, knowing on the bathroom door. “You okay?”

“Fine.” He heard a sniffle in her response.

“Ruby, let me talk. Please.” The door clicked open and Ruby opened it, signs she had been crying. Jaune did the only thing he could do and gave her a hug. “Ruby… you know Blake didn’t mean that. Sometimes, we get embarrassed or angry at our parents and complain. You and Yang complain about your dad all the time.”

“I know…” Ruby nodded in his arms, wrapping her own around him. “I just… she reminds me of all the stories dad told me about my mom. Kind and friendly… I want to experience that, but I can’t.”

“Ruby...” Jaune stared at her incredulously. “You do realize I have an reality altering swap remote?”

She blinked.

“Weiss is right, I’m a dolt.”

“Yes, yes you are.” They both laughed. “So, what do you want to swap?
1213112113122323211121321121331223221311.title: They take a break in the living room.

choices: Ruby
Weiss
Yang
121311211312232321112132112133122323.content:
Jaune agreed with Ruby’s request, it wasn’t like he could refuse. Ruby’s team was supposed to leave in like two hours so if they couldn’t convince Weiss in time, Jaune was supposed to swap with her. However, about an hour later, his Scroll pinged with a message from Ruby.

She agreed to go.

Jaune shrugged and pocketed his scroll. That didn’t change his plans at all. He really didn’t want to be stuck in Beacon for a week. As part of the detention, they couldn’t leave the school grounds without permission. Team RWBY was leaving Beacon for a vacation and Jaune really wanted to go. He had heard of Menagerie before. It was the main Faunus city on the beach and was supposed to be beautiful, even if most of the lands beyond that wasn’t the most hospitable. His plan was to sneak aboard and go along with them.

He wasn’t a monster though and didn’t want to take any of the girls’ spot permanently. Sure, he may swap with them periodically, but they still deserve to have fun at this festival. He forgot what was being celebrated but thought it had to do with the founding. When Ruby mentioned they were taking Zwei, Jaune hatched his plan. He was going to Life Swap with Zwei to board the ship with them. He would keep his body and everyone would see him as a dog. The only thing he had to be careful of was Ruby noticing the remote. She wouldn’t notice him at all, but the remote would raise questions.

So he decided to do a Life and Wardrobe Swap.

This meant he would have clothes and pockets to hide the remote, rather than carry it in his hand. He knew the remote worked on animals from yesterday’s test. Jaune waited at a window in an empty classroom overlooking the Bullhead landing platform until he saw Ruby, Weiss, Blake, and Yang head to one with bags. Tied to a leash being led by Ruby was Zwei. Jaune held up the remote, aimed, and clicked the button. There was a flash of green light and Jaune found himself standing in the grass behind Ruby. A leash was attached to his shirt but he didn’t have a collar.

“Come on, Zwei!” Ruby told him, pulling. “I know you don’t like Bullheads, but it’s only a short flight.”

“Don’t be so hard on him,” Weiss reprimanded her and then turned to Jaune. “Come on, boy!” She patted her legs to draw his attention. “You can cuddle with me during the ride to the docks.”

“Nah.” Yang waved her hand dismissively. “I got some of his treats in my bag. He will be by my side the second I take it out.”

“Just keep him away from me.” Blake mumbled and walked into the Bullhead.

Which girl does Jaune go with as Zwei?
121311211312232321112132112133122323.title: Jaune Needs a Vacation

choices: Bare with it and eat it.
Don't eat it.
Try to swap without being caught.
1213112113122323211121321121331223232.content:
“Ha!” Weiss laughed triumphantly as Jaune sat down beside her. Of course, from her point of view, Zwei had hopped on the seat next to her. She reached over and patted Jaune’s head and he instantly felt bliss. He was living a dog’s life so it was only natural he would like what a dog did. Ruby looked slightly disappointed but Yang didn’t. Blake was just glad he wasn’t anywhere near her.

From Jaune’s point of view, this was a no brainer. He finally got to spend time with the girl he liked. Of course being himself would have been better, but he would take what he could get. Thinking what a dog would do in this situation, Jaune scooted around in the seat and laid his head in Weiss’s lap. She laughed and scratched him behind the ears. No one noticed half his body laying on the ground as he couldn’t fit in the chair due to having his own body. Things got even better when Weiss leaned down and kissed him on the nose.

It was their first kiss!

Sadly, only he would know.

The girls started talking about the trip and Blake explained a bit about Menagerie’s festival. It was celebrating the founding and Faunus fight for equal rights. Jaune was only half listening, enjoying the intimate contact with Weiss. Yang must have gotten bored because Jaune heard a box rustle and his instincts caused him to raise his head.

“Here, Zwei!” Yang said shaking the box. “Want a treat for being a good boy?”

“He was just about to fall asleep.” Weiss chastised.

“Zwei loves his treats.” Ruby said with a laugh.

Jaune was in a pickle. He really didn’t want to eat the dog treat but with everyone watching him, he had to act natural. Saliva actually formed in his mouth as Zwei’s life told him he really wanted that treat. He could risk not taking it but the girls might think he was sick or something. He could also try to get out of it with the remote, but he risked someone, especially Ruby, noticing it.
1213112113122323211121321121331223232.title: Perks of Being a Dog

choices: He decided to swap something to make his dog life better.
He held off until they got on the boat.
Uh oh. Ruby wants to take him on a walk before they got on the ship.
12131121131223232111213211213312232321.content:
Jaune got up and try to just let Zwei’s instincts take over and ignore what he was about to do. Yang tossed him a treat and he raised his head up to grab it in midair. He bit down, chewed, and tried to swallow as fast as he could. To his surprise, it didn’t taste bad, just dry. Life Swaps affected tastes. He just now remembered during Weiss’s life he was attracted to healthy food. Once he ate it and discovering it wasn’t bad he stepped over to Yang and stood in front of her. He felt like he wanted more and just went along with it.

“Sorry.” Yang put the box away. “We can’t have you getting fat. One per day.” Jaune felt sadness over take him and she must have noticed. “Come here.” She reached out, wrapped her arms around him, and pulled his face into her breasts.”

“Woah!”

Jaune accidentally spoke and was worried what would happen. However, Yang just laughed and he realized it must have sounded like a bark. Deciding to take advantage of the situation, Jaune shook his head in her breasts. He’s not sure what they saw Zwei doing, but Yang didn’t seem to mind and she started talking to the others.

That’s how Jaune spent the rest of the Bullhead ride.

The girls would talk and eventually one of them would want him to come over and he would. He got to lay in Weiss’s laugh with the occasional kiss, scratched and hug by Yang, and Ruby even gave him a tummy rub. Being a dog was awesome. No responsibilities, girls loved him, and he could do all sorts of things normal guys couldn’t. Only Blake disliked him and he knew why. A bonus was he was learning a bit about each of the girls’ likes and dislikes, so he might be able to use the information later, especially with Weiss.

At long last, the Bullhead landed and the girls got off, with Ruby making sure Jaune was firmly attached to the leash. He felt kind of silly but glad the passersby didn’t notice anything. He was kind of bored as they made their way to the docks and fidgeted with the remote in his hand. From what he learned, they had a long trip ahead of them across the sea. He would have more freedom then to swap if he wanted.
12131121131223232111213211213312232321.title: Pros and Cons

choices: Explore the ship on his own.
Follow one of the girls.
Wait in the room until someone returned.
121311211312232321112132112133122323211.content:
If he didn’t know he had swapped with Zwei, the only difference Jaune noticed was being on a lease and the girls calling him a different name. He had no enhanced senses because all he did was swap lives and wardrobe. If he did bodies, he might have had it. As he followed the girls, he was just walking normally in his clothes. No one noticed if he was on all fours or on two legs weirdly enough. As the boat came into view, Jaune finally decided on a small swap to be a little more dog like.

His eyes fell on Blake.

More specifically, her ears hidden under her bow.

There was a flash of light and everything around him became a little louder. Jaune had used the Body Part Swap to exchange ears. Now Blake didn’t look different unless he looked closely. Her normal ears were slightly larger because they were now Jaune’s. He on the other hand had slightly smaller ears but now had an extra set of cat ears on his head. He couldn’t see them without a mirror but he reached up and felt them there.

At least he could hear somewhat like a dog now. He’ll give them back when they reach Menagerie.

He and the girls boarded the boat and Ruby let him off the leash. There weren’t many people on and the few were mostly Faunus. The girls’ first stop was to head toward their rooms and drop off their stuff. After that, they were all free to do their own thing. The ship was going to serve dinner in about an hour and breakfast the following morning. Ruby immediately bolted out the door to explore the ship. Yang wanted to go the deck and get some fresh air. Weiss and Blake decided to head off and talk. Jaune then had to decide what he wanted to do. He pretty much had free reign unless he bothered someone.
121311211312232321112132112133122323211.title: Enhanced Hearing

choices: He can't help but watch,
Leave and continue exploring.
Go back and find Ruby. He was getting hungry and it would be rude to watch this.
1213112113122323211121321121331223232111.content:
There wasn’t really anything to distract him so Jaune decided to exit the room and explore the ship. The people he passed mostly ignored him and those that didn’t barely spared him a glance. Only one person glared at him and that was a sailor with a mop. Jaune was sure that guy was thinking Jaune would make a mess somewhere and he would have to clean it up.

The deck had a few guests sunbathing in the last little bit of light before it got dark. Yang was one of them. Deciding not to disturb her, Jaune carried on. Another dog on the ship tried to sniff his butt and Jaune had to swat the beast away. He finished exploring the deck and descended down the stairs to explore the lower levels. There were less people here besides the ones behind closed door. Jaune was surprised how many people he could hear long before he saw them. Blake’s ears were really sensitive.

At the end of the hall, he heard a repetitive thud and decided to investigate since there wasn’t anything else to do. As he approached, he heard some voices but couldn’t quite make out the words. Curiosity prevented him from leaving and he drew closer.

“Oh, yeah! Keep going!”

Jaune froze for a moment at the girl’s words.

No… it couldn’t be.

The door ahead was cracked and Jaune approached it and peaked inside.

A Faunus with a large brown horse mane was kneeling on a bed, gripping the bottom of a girl on her hands and knees in front of him. The girl had light brown hair and deer antlers. Jaune’s mouth fell open as he watched the two of them continue to have sex. The guy was pounding her faster and faster as she cried out in ecstasy.

What does Jaune do now?
1213112113122323211121321121331223232111.title: Explore the ship on his own.

choices: Ruby
Yang
Blake
1213112113122323211121321121331223232111.content:
Jaune ran out of there not wanting to interrupt. He wasn’t going to cock block someone, even if he didn’t know them. He ascended up the stairs to the desk and found Ruby talking to Yang. He ran over and received a scratch behind the ears as they continued talking. Again, he forgot he was a dog there for a moment. He froze when they realized what they were talking about.

“We aren’t like that!” Ruby protested. “I just said it might be fun if Jaune and his team were here with us.”

“But Jaune especially, right?” Yang prodded. “You said he invited you over to hang out on Fridays.”

“With his team!” Ruby repeated. “Jaune’s cool-…”

“Debatable.”

“…and my best friend,” Ruby continued, choosing to ignore Yang’s comment. “Not counting Weiss.”

“Do you want to be more?” Yang asked, sounding a little more serious.

“I…” Ruby sat down on a free bench. “I just like hanging out with him. Plus, we trust each other with cool secrets and stuff. He even showed me this amazing dev… game even though he didn’t have to.”

“Hmm.” Yang’s expression turned suspicious and Jaune was worried he may have to watch out when he got back. He was lucky everyone saw him as Zwei. “Tell me this then. Let’s say after graduation, you become a Huntress and go out saving people from Grimm.”

“Okay?” Ruby wasn’t sure where this was going. Jaune didn’t either.

“Weiss is running the SDC, Blake is fighting for Faunus, and I’m just out traveling the world,” Yang continued. “Would you prefer to go off on your own or do you see someone else beside you?”

Ruby went silent for a moment and then her face grew crimson.

“Thought so.” Yang cracked her knuckles. “Looks like Jaune and I have to have a little talk.”

“Nooo!” Ruby cried, pushing Yang back down onto her seat. “He doesn’t know and I don’t want you to scare him off!”

“I’m not going to scare him off.”

Jaune saw his life flash before his eye at her obvious lie.

“Like all the guys back at Signal?” Ruby asked, crossing her arms.

“That was completely-…” Yang tried to reply.

“Do not scare my friend off.” Ruby stated sternly.

“…Fine.” Yang crossed her arms. “But I’ll be watching to make sure he doesn’t try anything.” Jaune suddenly remembered he tricked Ruby into swapping genitals that one time and was immensely grateful she didn’t mention the remote. Now he felt a little guilty sneaking into the trip.

“Weiss!” Ruby called out suddenly and Jaune and Yang turned to see Weiss and Blake approaching them. “This ship is huge! There are so many cabins and cool places to check out.”

“I guess it’s okay,” Weiss admitted.

“Not causing trouble?” Blake asked Yang.

“Nah, just teasing Ruby about h-…”

“…-How hungry I am!” Ruby interrupted. “Let’s go get some food!” She rushed off to the stairs.

“Okay?”

Weiss looked over at Yang, who grinned but didn’t say anything. She then looked over at Blake who shrugged. The three of them followed Ruby and Jaune went after them. It wasn’t like he could get food on his own in his situation. He would be chased away. No one would allow a dog to pick up food. The second they entered the mess hall, Jaune could smell fish being cooked. Blake’s expression suddenly changed and there was a thin line of drool in the corner of her mouth. Unlike Beacon, each guest got a plate of food rather than a buffet style. Dinner consisted of fish, potatoes, carrots, a small salad bar, and a couple choices of desert.

Ruby was sad they didn’t have cookies, but managed to snag herself a big piece of chocolate cake. Blake looked the happiest and once seated immediately began to dig in. Yang and Weiss brought up the back of the pack. Jaune however was left to sit on the floor. The table they chose was only big enough for four.

“Zwei! Here you go.” Ruby pulled out a can of dog food and emptied it on an extra plate she snagged. “Dinner!”

Jaune looked at the brown mush he was expected to eat compared to what the girls were eating. A treat was one thing, but even with Zwei’s life telling him to each it, he wasn’t going to do that. Ruby was distracted and he was going to switch lives with one of them to eat dinner. The question was who. Weiss was disregarded because he would never let his precious Snow Angel eat dog food.
1213112113122323211121321121331223232111.title: Time for Food

choices: A Grimm attacks during the night.
The night passes without incident.
A noise wakes up Jaune.
1213112113122323211121321121331223232111.content:
“Wow, Blake.” Yang said, looking up at the speed at which she was eating. “If I didn’t know better, I would think you liked fish.”

Jaune aimed the remote at her and pressed the button. Instantly he found himself off the floor and sitting in a chair. His clothes were now a tan jacket with a low cut yellow crop top underneath, if he had breasts it would be a lot sexier, and black micro shorts. There was a lot more hair on his head and back due to the Life Swap. A quick glance to his left and he saw Yang on all fours with her face in the mushy brown dog food. Her head lifted up for a moment and he saw bits of food on her cheeks. Her tongue was hanging out of her mouth and she looked incredibly happy. Jaune resisted the urge to laugh, knowing this was what Zwei was supposed to act like.

“It’s been a long time since I’ve tasted fish cooked the right way,” Blake said, patting her lips with a napkin and trying to act composed. She ate the rest of her meal a lot slower now. “Beacon is okay, but nothing beats real Menagerie cooking.”

“There’s going to be lot of food at the festival, right?” Ruby asked, tossing Yang a piece of fish. Yang jumped up and grabbed it with her mouth in the air.
