However, Jaune kept hitting it back. Yet he could never get it to hit the sand. Ruby would vanish in a blur and reappear under the ball almost instantly. It was becoming a battle of endurance. Jaune would normally have the advantage. Ruby was running around in the sand a lot more than him, which would drain her stamina faster. The problem was Jaune had miscalculated.

He had some extra weight on his chest.

Everyone time he jumped or darted to the side, the boobs he stole from Yang kept bouncing. It was oddly distracting plus the weight was a little inconvenient. There was also the fact Ruby was bouncing around in front of him. Even though she was a little younger than him, she was cute. Her chest wasn’t as big as Blake’s or Yang’s, but it was respectable. Those distractions caused Jaune to miss a couple easy saves, putting Ruby in the lead.

“The Kingdom of Rose is about to cause the complete destruction of the Zwei Empire!” Ruby called out, laughing.

“A Zwei never surrenders!” Jaune countered. “Plus, I have a secret weapon.”

Ruby raised an eyebrow.

“Okay… I don’t.”

She laughed at him.
1213112113122323211121321121331223232111.title: Beach Vollyball

choices: Meet up with Yang and Blake
Run into Kali.
Keep hanging out, but Ruby becomes oddly attached to him.
1213112113122323211121321121331223232111.content:
“What’s a cute girl like you doing with a loser like him?”

Ruby jumped as two guys stood near the volleyball net. Both of them were Faunus, one having wolf ears and the other having a lizard tail. She turned and glared at them before serving the ball back to Jaune. Jaune frowned, but returned the ball, knowing Ruby was trying to ignore them.

“Hey!” The guy with the tail called out rudely. ”Come and hang out with us. I’ll show you a good time.”

“Leave us alone.” Ruby finally said, hitting the ball back and determinedly not looking at them.

“Don’t be like that.”

“She’s just playing hard to get, dude.” The wolf eared guy said, nudging him in the side. The first guy took the hint and approached Ruby. Jaune dropped the ball and marched toward them. He had seen this before with his sisters. Ruby may be too nice to push them away and the situation would only escalate.

“She said to leave her alone!” Jaune called out and Ruby turned to him gratefully.

“I’m just saying hi.” The guy replied with a look of distain. “Why don’t you get your ugly ass out of here and leave the girl with me.”

The irony was if he knew what Jaune really looked like, instead of just a guy, he would kill to have a moment of Jaune’s time.

“No.” Jaune grabbed Ruby’s hand and pulled her after him. The guy glared and put a hand on Jaune’s shoulder.

“I told you to get out of here.” Jaune turned but was too late.

A fist collided with the side of his face.

“You jerk!”

Before that guy knew what happened, Ruby had knocked him down on the ground. If she had been wielding Crescent Rose, a large scythe blade might have been held at his neck at the angry look in her eyes.

“I’m fine.” Jaune quickly reassured her. “Aura, remember? Besides, we shouldn’t use our training on people. Let’s just go. We are causing a scene.” The blow wasn’t hard enough to leave even a bruise, which was lucky. He didn’t want to ruin Kali’s face.

“Right.” Ruby glanced around and saw people staring. She let Jaune drag her off leaving the guys behind.

“Ouch, dude. You tried to pick up a huntress and her boyfriend.”

Ruby’s face flushed crimson.

After they were well away from the others, Jaune turned to her.

“Are you okay?”

“Yeah… I’m just… not used to talking to forward guys like that.”

“You seem to talk to Ren and me just fine.”

“That’s different,” Ruby protested, waving her arms. “You two are friends. Those guys are strangers trying to hit on me.” Her face flushed. “Please don’t tell Yang.”

“Tell her what?” Jaune asked, grinning.

“That they… oh. Haha.” They both laughed.

What did they do now?
1213112113122323211121321121331223232111.title: Some strangers approach.

choices: Undo Swaps and start over with other combinations.
Stay as is and hang out with Ruby more.
See what Yang and Blake want to do.
1213112113122323211121321121331223232111.content:
“Hi, KalI!” Ruby called out, waving enthusiastically.

“Hello, Ruby.” Kali propped herself up from her position sunbathing. “Hello, Zwei. Enjoying yourself?”

“It’s been pretty fun so far.” Jaune replied, diverting his eyes.

“Until some jerks decided to come and act all jerky to me and Zwei.” Ruby interjected. Kali raised an eyebrow and glanced at Jaune.

They were flirting with her, Jaune mouthed and Kali nodded briefly.

While Ruby was venting to Kali, Jaune took in the unusual sight before him. Kali was in his body, but wearing a one piece black female swimsuit. This would have normally gotten a lot of looks, but no one even batted an eye, except an occasional male who wanted to check her out. Jaune on the other hand had Kali’s body but with his own dick and Yang’s boobs. Yet, everyone saw him as a boy. Yang was running around topless with Kali’s boobs and it was perfectly acceptable.

Thinking to himself, he really had been making a lot of swaps. Perhaps he could undo a bunch of them back until the only swap was him and Zwei. Start over and try out some new combinations. Weiss had been a dog for a while and she should get a chance to have fun. His bag was near Kali and he could pretend to get sunscreen out of it. Of course, he could continue to hang out with Ruby. She was having fun. Then he noticed Yang and Blake coming toward them, so he may have to act fast.
1213112113122323211121321121331223232111.title: Run into Kali.

choices: Continue as a dog for now and try to take advantage of the situation.
Get seen as a human again with the remote.
Try a really unusual swap to see how reality can change.
1213112113122323211121321121331223232111.content:
It was hard enough for Jaune to keep track of all the swaps and he was the one who made them.

He started undoing all the swaps after reaching into the bag and stealthily removing the remote as Ruby talked to Yang and Blake. When he lost Kali’s body, that was a big hit. He was finally getting used to it. The loss of Yang’s chest also threw him off balance a little. He had to be careful and went through the Undo Swap button slowly. If he accidentally undid the swap with Zwei, he would find himself back at Beacon with no way to swap back here. Once all the other swaps were undone, reality only saw him as Zwei, Ruby’s pet.

“How about some lunch?” Kali asked, holding out a picnic basket full of sandwiches. She must have grabbed some from a nearby shop while the kids were off playing. Mom of the year right there.

“Can I call you mom?” Yang asked, plopping down next to her and taking one greedily.

Blake glared at her.

“That’s fine, Yang.” Kali assured her giving her a hug. “I’ve always loved taking care of people. Blake used to bring home friends late at night all the time when she was young.”

Blake’s face flushed.

“Come here, Zwei.” Ruby said, patting her lap. Jaune checked to make sure the remote was hidden in his swimsuit and went over to her. He sat on her lap like he did before and Ruby wrapped her arms around him, while looking around his body at Weiss. “This trip is awesome isn’t it?”

“Besides those locals doing a terrible job at flirting with us?” Weiss asked.

“You just need Zwei to make it all better.” Ruby put her hands on the side of Jaune’s head. “Zwei, Kisses! Show those jerks how it’s done.”

Jaune knew what to do. He moved up and kissed Ruby on the cheek. She giggled and looked over at Weiss, who was watching them apprehensively.

“Go ahead, Weiss.” Ruby encouraged her. “Zwei loves you.”

“Here, Zwei.” Weiss said, patting her lap. “Come here, boy.”

Jaune was already moving to his crush. When he sat on her lap, which was quite difficult due to her small frame, he turned around to see a beautiful smile on her face. She opened her mouth and said two words Jaune had been waiting to hear.

“Zwei, kisses.”

Jaune couldn’t resist and immediately planted his lips directly on Weiss’s. He wrapped his arms around her thin waste and his tongue began to explore her mouth. After about thirty seconds, she pushed him down and laughed. He finally realized what he had done and was glad there didn’t seem to be an repercussions.

“Zwei really does like her,” Yang commented. “He doesn’t lick me that enthusiastically.” Even when he acted out, everyone saw it as a normal dog thing. Jaune began to think how he could abuse this. Maybe get more intimate times with one of the girls.

“Because he’s a noble breed who recognizes a true Huntress.” Weiss replied.

“He really is such a well-behaved and intelligent dog,” Kali added and looked at Ruby. “How did you family come across him.”

“It’s a long story,” Ruby answered and immediately began telling it. Jaune zoned out and slouched down, snuggling up against Weiss as she fed him some beef. It was just like his dream, minus the fact Weiss thought he was a dog.

“Why does everyone like him?” Blake muttered dryly.

What happens next?
1213112113122323211121321121331223232111.title: Undo Swaps and start over with other combinations.

choices: Explore this reality.
Make another unusual swap.
Something distracts him.
1213112113122323211121321121331223232111.content:
Jaune looked around and thought about what kind of bizarre swaps he could perform.

What he mostly had been doing up till now was swapping himself with people. However he began to notice going from one person to another tended to make weird combinations. What if he purposely tried to swap other people by using a triangular swap style with himself?

Looking at Kali and Ruby, he began to devise a plan. Ruby always said she was an adult, so what if he put her in that position? It took a moment to think about how to do it. Once he settled on the plan, he waited until Ruby go up to throw her trash away before making the swap. The first thing he did was perform a Life Swap with Ruby. There was a flash of green light and Ruby was walking on all fours, topless, around the others while he was wearing her swim red swim suit. He looked really weird and the swimsuit felt uncomfortable around his crotch. It didn’t bother him too much as he knew no one would notice.

The next swap was targeting Kali. Instead of a Life Swap again, he perform a Personal Info Swap. The target this time was children. There was a flash of green light, but Jaune didn’t stop to see what happened. He immediately Life Swapped back with Ruby and found himself lying on the corner of the blanket. Ruby returned and sat down. Nothing noticeable had changed yet.

“Well, that was good.” Yang sighed and patted her stomach. “The beach really takes it out of you.”

“It was much, just a few things I scraped together.” Kali replied. “You shouldn’t go swimming for 30 mins after eating though, even if you are Huntresses.”

“I’m fine with just talking.” Weiss stated. She reached over and scratched Jaune behind the ears. “I haven’t had this much sun in a long time and need to reapply sunblock.”

“Poor Weiss cream is melting.” Yang teased and Weiss rolled her eyes.

“Aunt Yang really doesn’t let up on the jokes.” Blake sighed to Ruby.

Jaune’s ears picked up on this.

“You didn’t have to grow up with her.”

“Yeah, but I’m old enough to know the jokes, Mom.”

Jaune held a hand over his mouth as he tried not to laugh. Ruby was two years younger than Blake, and yet in this reality, Ruby was somehow her mother. He wasn’t sure how that was possible. Though, if Ruby was the mom, that naturally made Yang the aunt.

“How is your dad?” Kali asked Ruby. “I was hoping he would come along. We haven’t seen each other in years. Ghira was looking forward to it.” So it seemed they were invited because Kali and Ruby’s dad knew each other. The remote altered enough memories so they could still be here.

“Increased Grimm activity near Patch required him to stay behind,” Ruby replied. “He wanted to come.”

“So how is it being on the same team with your sister and daughter?” Kali asked Ruby. “Ghira and I never had kids. There was just too much going on at the time.”

“Not much different than at home,” Ruby answered. “Weiss was a little upset at first, as she was the odd one out, but I totally got her out of her shell.”

“By exploding!” Yang called out.

“Don’t remind me.” Weiss muttered, face palming.

“Loose dust.” Blake explained to a confused Kali.

Jaune laughed. No matter how much things changed, everyone stayed the same. Perhaps he should take some time to learn about this reality where Ruby was Blake’s mom. There were questions to discover, like who was the dad? How do they explain the age difference? Was Blake just adopted?

Of course, with everyone distracted, now was the perfect time to make another weird swap. Maybe one to benefit himself?
1213112113122323211121321121331223232111.title: Ruby's a Mom

choices: Weiss immediately kissed Jaune when he returned.
Their realtionship was more reserved.
No reaction when he returned. (Secret Relationship.)
1213112113122323211121321121331223232111.content:
How could he use the remote to give himself a dream vacation?

Naturally, his first thought was to become human again, but dismissed the idea. As a dog, he could eat, sleep, and follow cute girls around without anyone being the wiser. If he wanted specific food, he could just swap for it. No. He wanted something that had always escaped him. Even if it would only be because of the remote, Jaune wanted to see what it was like.

His eyes fell on Weiss.

Really, she never gave him the time of day and Jaune had begun to accept that. There were other girls out there, but he still considered her beautiful. He was sure if he could just spend a little time together in a relationship, the remaining feelings could finally be let go. The question was how was he to go about that? If Weiss was dating someone, he could have just swap with the guy.

Now Jaune had to be creative.

He swapped Ruby back to herself and Kali as Blake's mother.

While the girls’ talked, he stood up and walked around. No one paid him much attention, as they figured he was just stretching his legs. The beach was full of couples and Jaune wanted to select the right one. Skipping over families, he found his target. A cute girl with antlers was kissing a boy with a horse mane. Jaune carefully aimed the remote at the boy.

There was a flash of green light and their romantic relationship was swapped.

Instantly, the girl pushed the boy away and walked over to Jaune. Before he could do anything else, she started kissing him passionately. Surprised by the suddenness of the action, he couldn’t react. When the girl finally broke free, she smiled at him and Jaune took the opportunity to Life Swap with her. He found himself standing opposite of the now topless girl. She was wearing only his swim trunks and he was wearing her two piece.

“What’s wrong?” She asked, but Jaune ignored her.

Quickly aiming at Weiss, another Romantic Relationship Swap was made. The girl in Zwei’s life now turned and headed back toward Jaune’s friends. Before she got very far, Jaune life swapped back with her. The girl no longer had anything to do with him or Weiss and left. Though did not make out with the boy again. The boy didn’t seem to be interested in her either.

They were simply a casualty.

If things went as Jaune wanted, he and Weiss were now in a romantic relationship. There was no way to know exactly what the depth of their relationship was. He chose that couple because they seemed to be in love and were bold enough to make out in public. Weiss’s personality may change that.
1213112113122323211121321121331223232111.title: Time to get his rewards.

choices: Ruby suggests the team go and do something together.
Weiss and Jaune go off on their own.
Ruby, Weiss, and Jaune sneak off while Blake tries to stop Yang and her Mom.
1213112113122323211121321121331223232111.content:
“I’m glad you’re back, Zwei.” Weiss told him the moment he sat down. Before he could respond, her perfect lips locked against his own. “It’s always more pleasant when you’re nearby.”

“Rub it in, Weiss.” Yang rolled her eyes.

“Perhaps you could get a boyfriend if you weren’t such a tease.” Weiss countered.

“I just have to find someone man enough to handle all this,” Yang countered and gestured to her body. “Plus, he’s got to have a sense of humor. That’s a big requirement.”

“Pretty sure no one except a dad laughs at your jokes.” Blake muttered.

“Don’t be jealous of Weiss and Zwei’s relationship,” Ruby admonished her sister. “The best pet and best partner getting together is awesome. It’s like we’re all one big family.”

Jaune wasn’t sure what to make of her words. He was still technically the dog Zwei and was Ruby’s and Yang’s pet. Yet he was dating Weiss Schnee, a promising Huntress and heir to a big corporation. Reality considered it normal though, so he didn’t think too hard about it. The beautiful girl wrapping her arms around him and playing with his hair was quite distracting. He wrapped his arm around her dainty waist and just basked in the attention.

“It’s so nice to see blossoming relationships, regardless of race.” Kali beamed at them. “We still have some time before any of the main festival attractions start. Go out in have some fun. I’m going to take the chance and relax.” She stretched and laid out on the blanket in the sun. “Let me know if you need anything.”

“Know any cute boys you can introduce us too?” Yang asked immediately and she laughed.

“They might be a little old than you, though I think Cecil’s boy just turned 16.”

“Ugh, I’m looking for someone a year old two older.”

“Please say you have something planned to get your sister away from my mother?” Blake pleaded with Ruby.

“Uhh….” Ruby started thinking fast.

“Let’s leave those buffoons to their own devices and have some alone time.” Weiss suggested, running a finger down Jaune’s chest.

“Okay!” Jaune replied automatically, but really all Weiss heard was a happy bark.
1213112113122323211121321121331223232111.title: Weiss immediately kissed Jaune when he returned.

choices: Go with Weiss, he could use the practice.
Talk his way out.
Try to use the remote to get out of this.
12131122.content:
Jaune froze right when his hand was about to hit the door to Ruby’s dorm.

Hang on, he thought. This device can change Personal Info, so wouldn’t that allow me to do something like… switching team positions? I could be on the same team as Weiss. If I switched places with Ruby, we would still be friends, just on opposite teams. She’s mentioned she would like to escape Yang’s grip for a little bit.

He finally knocked now that the plan was formed, as he partially concealed the remote. The door opened and Ruby answered. As she opened her mouth to say hi, Jaune hit the button. There was a flash of light and nothing seemed to have changed. Jaune was still standing outside the room while Ruby was standing inside.

“Hi, Jaune,” she greeted him cheerfully. “I hope you don’t have to stay long. Weiss isn’t in the best of mood.”

“Is it about me?” Jaune asked hopefully and Ruby giggled.

“Both of us,” Ruby answered. “My grade in history is slipping and your combat skills need some… fine tuning.”

“Thanks.” Jaune sighed dejectedly and Ruby patted his arm. That was one of the nicest ways of saying he was terrible and he appreciated it.

“She and I are just best friends, so she helps me out,” Ruby continued. “Since you’re her team leader, she’s going to be really tough on you. Don’t expect her to go easy on you anymore with your training.”

“Anymore?” A memory flashed through Jaune’s mind that he knew didn’t exist before that moment. It was like reliving a scene though a TV. During initiation, Weiss decided to be his partner over Ruby and he was made leader of Team JYBS (pronounced Jaybirds.) Things had been rocky but Weiss had finally opened up to Jaune and Ruby over time. Weiss had been training him, but his constant losses were testing her patience.

That was weird, Jaune thought, rubbing his head. Wish I had more details.

“Are you okay?” Ruby asked concerned.

“Just a little headache,” he reassured her. “Probably going to be worse by the time Weiss gets through with me.” Ruby smiled sympathetically.

“She means well, you know.” Jaune nodded. “Well, I’m heading back to my room. Good luck.” Ruby waved goodbye and Jaune stepped into what was formerly Team RWBY’s dorm.

The first thing he noticed was the bunkbeds they had set up were still up. It was just Ruby’s bed, also known as the hanging death trap, above Weiss’s bed was much more stable and didn’t look like It was about to fall down. Jaune recognized an X-Ray and Vav comic he owned on the top bunk, indicating that was his bed. One of the desks had all his books and writing stuff scattered around on it. Other than those two details, the room looked the same as normal. The remote changed everything to fit the new information. All of Ruby’s stuff was probably in his old room now. One of Yang’s bras was even lying out in the open on her bed.

The bathroom door opened and Jaune turned to see Weiss stepping back into the room. She was wearing her traditional thigh-length strapless dress with a faint color gradation from white to pale blue at the hem, which was stitched to resemble snowflakes, and a white bell-sleeved bolero. Their eyes met and she glared.

“You!” She shouted angrily.

“I’m sorry!” Jaune apologized by instinct. His fear was that the remote only switched his and Ruby’s perspective.

“After all that training we’ve done,” Weiss scolded, marching up and slapping him upside the head. “You’ve only gotten your defense fixed. There were so many times that brute Cardin telegraphed his attacks and left himself wide open. You need to learn to be more aggressive and counter attack. Just because you use a shield and have a high amount of Aura doesn’t mean you can just turtle the entire match.”

All of this was true. Pyrrha said the same things to him. Jaune liked to defend and leave offense to his team members, like Nora. The issue was people won’t attack him if he’s not a threat and, unless he attacks them in that situation, he won’t be useful. Intercepting and counter attacking would be the preferred method of fighting for him.

“So… eh?” Jaune wasn’t use to being alone with Weiss for this long, let alone her going over his match with him. “I take it you have an idea of what to do?” Weiss smiled sinisterly.

“We are going down to a training room and you aren’t leaving until you successfully counter attack me three times in a row.”

Jaune gulped.
12131122.title: Don't Tell Ruby About the Remote.

choices: Use the remote of Weiss.
Go somewhere else with the remote.
Before he can decide, Ruby shows up.
121311221.content:
“Please go easy on me,” Jaune pleaded, as he held up his shield in front of him with his sword in the ready position. He was wearing a black hoody underneath a white chest plate and his shoulders were protected by spaulders. In front of him, Weiss stood before him in a fencer pose. Her rapier held up and pointed directly at him.

“Now, Arc,” she replied. “That would defeat the purpose of training.” A white glyph appeared behind her. Her semblance. Out of nowhere, without even changing her footing, she charged forward. Jaune raised his shield to intercept the blow and felt himself being pushed backwards. Weiss wasn’t that physically strong, by the momentum caused by her glyph increased her striking power. He felt another couple blows batter his shield. “Come on. You can’t hide behind it forever.” Peaking over the shield after deflecting another blow, Jaune raised his sword and yelled as he swung downwards.

Weiss stepped back to avoid the blow and pelted his arm with her rapier.

“I’m not supposed to bait you into attacking,” she reprimanded, her gaze stern. “You need to control the battlefield and not listen to your opponents antagonizing you.” Jaune nodded and they repeated the process. After thirty minutes, Weiss was growing frustrated in his lack of improvement. “Attack me seriously already!”

“I’m trying!” Jaune protested.

“No, you’re holding yourself back. That’s the worst thing you can do in training. You need to go all out. It could end up costing you and your team their lives if you don’t know your true capabilities.” Jaune gritted his teeth at the thought of Weiss falling because of his stupid mistakes. He raised his shield and sword once more. Something about him must have changed, because Weiss’s expression grew serious. She bolted forward using another glyph and, this time, Jaune was ready.

He threw his shield into her as she accelerated forward.

“AH!” Weiss was not expecting that action and she was forced to batter the shield away with her rapier. The motion took away all of her attack power and Jaune took advantage of her confusion. He charged forward and rammed his shoulder into her stomach, knocking the air out of her. “Oomph!” As Weiss fell back, Jaune landed on top of her and brought his sword down next to her head. A loud clang echoed in the training room as his sword hit metal.

“Got you,” Jaune declared from above her. Weiss glared at him, but there was a hint of a smile.

“About time,” she said. “Now can you get off of me?” Jaune scrambled to his feet at held out a hand to help her up, which she accepted. “That was... unorthodox to say the least and it showed my own inexperience. Next time, that won’t work against me, so you need to keep practicing. You can’t be afraid to strike back.”

“Are we done?” Jaune asked cautiously, noticing Weiss was walking back toward a bench to grab a towel. “I thought I had to do it three times in a row?”

“I just wanted to avoid a lucky strike from you flailing around,” Weiss informed him. “That was more than luck, so you pass today.”

“Phew.” Jaune collapsed on the bench next to her and removed his chest plate. He then raised his hoody and wiped the sweat from his face. Weiss was merciless and the workout was exhausting. As she watched him, Jaune realized something important.

He was still in Coco’s body.

When he wiped his face, he inadvertently revealed his breasts. He had changed into his combat attire in the male locker-room and had been partially in a daze Weiss was spending time with him. Besides, all he really did was throw clothes and armor over his shirt. No one else was around.

“We shall practice here tomorrow after class for at least an hour tomorrow,” Weiss told him in a tone saying he had no choice. There was no hint she even registered his female form. “I’m cutting training time today because you participated in Professor Goodwitch’s combat class. Can’t have you collapse from exhaustion.”

“Weiss,” Jaune said sincerely. ”Thanks for all the help. I really mean it.” This left him time to think about what he learned. Body Swap definitely did not change people’s perspective of him.

“Humph.” She sniffed loudly. “It’s the least I could do. We can hardly have our team leader be weak, regardless of how well your planning skills are.” Jaune blinked.

Did Weiss just compliment him?

“I’m heading back to the dorm. If you decide to stay back and train, don’t push yourself too much.” Jaune nodded and watched her head toward the female locker room.

What should he do now?
121311221.title: Go with Weiss, he could use the practice.

choices: He swaps weapons.
He swaps Semblances.
He swaps something else.
1213112213.content:
Weiss disappeared and Jaune was about to leave himself, when Ruby stuck her head in.

“You’re alive!” she called out and Jaune laughed.

“Barely. You were right. She didn’t hold back.”

In a flash of petals, Ruby appeared next to him. She was wearing her usual black long sleeved dress with red trim on the sleeves and skirt, a black waist cincher with red lacing up the front, a pair of thick black stockings, black combat boots with red laces, and her signature red hooded cloak. Crescent Rose, her signature weapon, a high caliber sniper rifle that could transform into a large scythe was currently in its compact mode on her hip.

“You seem in a better mood though,” Ruby commented, looking at his face closely.

“I passed today’s practice,” Jaune said proudly, puffing out his chest. This accentuated Coco’s chest, not that Ruby noticed. She only laughed at his bravado. “Weiss may be strict, no not may, is, definitely is. But she’s not unreasonable. We know we need the help.”

“I know,” Ruby admitted. “She can just be a bit… intense. Less shouting wouldn’t hurt too.”

“I don’t know,” Jaune mused. “She managed to kick my butt into gear that way.”

“Glad you’re having fun.” Ruby rolled her eyes. “I came here to see if you needed cheering up.”

“Oh?” Jaune raised an eyebrow. “Well, I appreciate it, Rubes. What were you going to do?”

“Well…” Ruby twisted her foot onto the ground nervously. “I thought you might like a chance to shoot Crescent Rose a few times. Since you don’t have a range weapon and all.” Jaune’s eyes widened at the offer. Ruby was very protective of her weapon and rarely let anyone tough it, let alone use it. She really wanted to cheer him up.

“Ruby… I… thanks.” Jaune wrapped her in a one arm hug. “That means a lot, Crater Face.”

“Just for that, Vomit Boy,” Ruby replied and stuck her tongue out at him. “You don’t get the honor today!” She disappeared in a flash of rose petals only to appear twenty feet away. Her Semblance was high speed movement that for some reason left those petals behind. Her expression softened and Jaune knew if he pressed the issue, she would let him. “I’m glad you’re back to normal Jaune. Let me know if you ever want to hang out. I’m going to go see if I can find Pyrrha.” Ruby turned around and Jaune reached for the remote in his pocket.

The opportunity was too good to pass up. He could swap their weapons, or their Semblances, not that he discovered his yet, or something else. Whatever he swapped could always be given back once he had his fun.
1213112213.title: Before he can decide, Ruby shows up.

choices: Give Ruby back her Semblance.
Keep Ruby's Semblance for now.
Swap Semblances with someone else.
12131122132.content:
Jaune didn’t trust himself to use Ruby’s weapons. How she could use it so efficiently was beyond him. If he tried, he probably would lose a foot. Her speed Semblance on the other hand was something he really wanted to try. Any Semblance actually would be fun to try out, as he didn’t have one. There was a flash of light and Jaune didn’t feel any different. Ruby exited the training room and he was left all alone.

What do I do now?

Jaune wasn’t sure how to activate the Semblance. Did he just will it, was it something to do with Aura, or did it take a specific stimulus? Jaune tried to relax and let him mind inform him on what to do, like what happened when he switched team positions with Ruby. There weren’t memories, but more like a flash of insight this time. He looked to the other side of the room and stepped forward. Everything around him blurred and he nearly fell over. In an instant, he crossed the room.

This is awesome.

Jaune grinned back. Neon had no idea who she was messing with. He wasn’t the champion back home for nothing. It was time to up his game. This was not the time to hold back. Jaune started breaking out all of his moves he learned over the years and the crowd loved it. Neon’s eyes went wide and her grin grew. Her dance moves increased in complexity too and the circle around them grew larger. Most people had stopped dancing and were watching the dance off. When the song finally ended, the two of them stopped dancing. They stood there panting and sweating.

The crowd’s roar of approval caused Jaune’s ears to shake.

“Where did you learn to dance like that?” Neon demanded as they sat down. Her eyes were sparkling. “I haven’t seen anyone keep up with me for years.”

“Ah, I have a lot of sisters and learned how to dance from them,” Jaune admitted. “There was a club back home I went to a lot.”

“You sure know how to party, girl.” Neon laughed and ordered them a couple drinks. “Those dance moves were super crazy awesome! Next round’s on me. I think we need it after that, right?”

“Much appreciated,” Jaune agreed.

The girl before him sure knew her way around a club and she started talking about a few raves she participated in back home. The girl was way more than Jaune could handle on a normal basis, but for one night? She was a great guide. His mood was interrupted a little when a couple guys came over. Jaune could understand them hitting on Neon, but one of them tried to hit on him too. Even if they did see him as a girl, it was a bit disconcerting. Neon stood up and chased them away, her tail flickering over the table. Jaune couldn’t resist the temptation presented right in front of him and selected Body Part Swap again.

The next second, he flickered his new pink cat tail back and forth. The fact his jeans now had a hole in the back for his tail wasn’t lost on him. Neon was wearing a skirt and her tail had been right above it.

“What’s next?” Jaune asked and Neon’s eyes glowed with mischief.

“We could stay here, hit another club nearby, or…” She trailed off.

“Or… what?” Jaune said, knowing she was purposely baiting him.

“There’s one exclusive club we could try to get in,” Neon informed him. “It’s called Junior’s. There’s always a line of people trying to get in. Sometimes girls can cut in front. The rumors are the parties are amazing, even if the club is a little rougher than this one. Want to try?”
1213112213221112112121.title: Dance Off

choices: Use the remote to get in.
Call Neon and see if she can help.
Give up and go do something else.
12131122132211121121211.content:
“Let’s do it!”

Maybe it was the alcohol talking, but Jaune figured it was the night to be adventurous. Neon slapped him in the back in joy.

“I pegged you as the adventurous type the moment I saw you,” Neon told him, as they got up and left the club. “I bet you break all sorts of rules back at Beacon.”

“Hehehe.” Jaune rubbed the back of his head. The fake transcripts, food fight, and all the times they either cover Nora’s antics or went along with them flashed through his mind. “You could say that. Property damage happens a lot around a friend of mine.”

“She sounds like a blast.” They two of them made their way to the bus stop right when the bus pulled away. “Dang it!” Neon moaned and checked the schedule on her phone. “We have to wait thirty minutes for another one? That’s like, forever!”

“Do you know where the club is?” Jaune asked and Neon nodded. She held up her phone and Jaune made note of the direction.

“Why? You have a car hidden somewhere?”

“No,” Jaune admitted. “But I have another mode of transportation. It’s not too far, so I should be able to carry you.” Ruby carried him before with her speed Semblance, so he should be able to carry Neon. Neon tilted her head in confusion.

“What do you mean carry-…?” She never finished her sentence as Jaune grabbed her and disappeared in a flash of rose petals to anyone looking at them. He was moving at speeds normal eyes couldn’t follow. In only a few minutes, he stopped and set Neon down about a block away from Junior’s. She stumbled to her feet and stared at him, her mouth hanging open slightly.

“Eh, probably should have given you some warning, huh?” Jaune rubbed his head sheepishly.

“Yeah,” Neon agreed. “But I’ll forgive you…. BECAUSE THAT WAS TOTALLY AWESOME!” She hugged him. “Your Semblance is amazing. I bet you had fun first discovering it.”

“Something like that.” He felt guilty about stealing it from Ruby now. “Shall we get going?”

“Oh yeah,” Neon skipped forward so suddenly Jaune had to half run to catch up. She had not been kidding. There was a huge line of people forming up. There were people around their age all the way up to easily in the thirty to forties. “Nervous?” She elbowed him in the side.

“A little,” Jaune confirmed. “Never been to an exclusive club.”

“Just follow my lead,” Neon reassured him and walked forward. The bouncer turned two guys away before Neon reached him. She waved to him and leaned forward to show off her cleavage. The bouncer rolled his eyes and let her in. Jaune couldn’t believe how easy it was to get in, with all the people waiting. He stepped forward and the bouncer in a suit and red sunglasses stared at him.

“Er… I’m with her.”

“Back of the line, girl.” He growled. “Clubs full.”

“But-…” Jaune began.

“Back of the line!”

Jaune sighed and stepped back, reaching for his phone. He could call Neon about another way to get in or just leave and let her enjoy herself. His hand touched the remote and that gave him a third option.
12131122132211121121211.title: Next Stop, Junior's.

choices: Swap with Neon.
Swap with the girl in white.
Swap with the girl in red.
121311221322111211212111.content:
Jaune hadn’t come this far to give up now. His tail flickered back and forth and his ears drooped as he thought about what to do. A few more guests were allowed in before a couple people from the line were allowed. Two less attractive guys were ejected from the line, along with a plump girl. Jaune was beginning to get a glimmer of an idea on how to get in.

There’s a certain level of attractiveness, importance, or popularity to get in. The bouncer is weeding out less desirable people based on the clubs direction most likely. They are letting a few normal people in, probably so their reputation spread. So to get in, all I need to do is swap with someone who they want. Not like waiting in line is going to be feasible.

He spent a moment surveying possible targets when one woman caught his eye. She was obviously rich based on her elegant long black dress and her large sunglasses obscured most of her face. She was getting out of a limo and someone from the club came out to greet her. Jaune acted quickly and hit the Personal Info Swap button as he walked forward toward the bouncer again. This time, he swapped attractiveness. If he was right, he should be able to get in.

The bouncer waved him in immediately.

Knew it, Jaune thought. Once he was safely inside, he hit the undo so the woman could get in. He had been told his looks were average, maybe slightly above. If the world saw him as a girl, he would only be an average one. Switching attractiveness meant he was considered beautiful and the bouncer let him in. The music was loud and thumping, but he was used to it now. He looked around and saw Neon at a table talking with a guy who looked like he was hitting on her.

“There’s my friend,” Neon informed the guy. “I’m hanging out with her today, so go ahead and scram.” The guy didn’t look too depressed and left. “About time. I figured you got lost.”

“Had to convince the bouncer to let me in,” Jaune explained.

“Hope you didn’t do anything too extreme,” Neon said apologetically.

“Nah, he was understanding.” Neon raised an eyebrow but didn’t press the issue. Jaune then noticed two shots were already on the table.

“Figured we could take one before hitting the dance floor,” Neon explained, holding up her glass. Jaune held up his and they clinked the glasses together before downing them. “Alright, girl. Let’s show these squares how to party!” She grabbed Jaune’s hand and pulled him toward the dance floor.

They spent the next thirty minutes dancing and were drawing a crowd again. This time, a lot of other girls and some guys joined in. Everyone was having a blast. Eventually, Jaune and Neon needed a break. The crowd was a little disappointed, but Neon promised they would be back. She and Jaune sat down and ordered a few drinks from the bar. They quickly learned several guys had paid for their drinks ahead of time while they were dancing. The two of them downed two shots each before sipping a cosmopolitan. It was kind of a girly fruity drink, but Jaune liked it.

Girls are lucky they can drink this stuff without being judged, Jaune thought and rubbed his temple. The loud music was getting to him.

“Anything wrong?” Neon asked.

“Just have sensitive ears,” Jaune replied with a shrug. “I get used to it.”

“Ooo, I can see how that would damper your mood,” Neon said sympathetically. “Don’t see too many humans with animal parts like a tail and ears. Usually, it’s just Faunus.” She shrugged. “But who am I to talk. I’m a Faunus without any animal trait.” Jaune was pretty sure biology didn’t work like that, as only Faunus had animal parts. The remote, however, must have altered reality to make that excuse reasonable.

“You’re already pretty enough,” Jaune assured her and she laughed.

“Flattery will get you everywhere,” Neon told him. “If only you were a guy. I would totally date you after tonight.”

I could change that, Jaune thought to himself and then remembered Weiss back at beacon. Nah, I love Weiss. I’m not going to date anyone else and it would be rude to date her without being serious. Still, Jaune felt like using the remote again. As he reached for it, a loud commotion drew his attention. A guy was kicked, knocking over a table. Before him stood a pair of black haired, green eyed twin girls. One wore a red strapless dress with black fur over her shoulders, while the other wore a white strapless dress with a white feathered scarf. The girl in white was the one to kick him.
http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/vill...

“We told you to get out,” the girl said. “We aren’t going to ask again.”

“We don’t need your kind here trying to grab the female customers,” her sister in red said.

“If you ever come back,” the first sister said. “It will be the last thing you do.” The guy scrambled away and out the front door as fast as possible while the crowd laughed and cheered.

“Serves that pervert right!” Neon yelled. Jaune fiddled with the remote. He now had two more targets.
121311221322111211212111.title: Crashing the Party

Personal Info or Personality Swap
1213112213221112112121113.content:
The girl in red seemed to be the younger, more reserved of the sisters. Jaune wanted to leave the older sister in white alone so that she could still perform her job of watching out for the patrons in the club. Now that Jaune chose his target, he had to decide what swap to do. The alcohol must have been getting to him to make him bolder in his swap targets.

There wasn’t any specific body part that stood out. Both girls were highly attractive and any part he swapped with them would be worth it. Jaune eyed their chests as he sipped his drink. A full Body Swap was an option too, but Jaune would lose his ears and tail unless he immediately swapped them back. He wasn’t sure if he wanted to lose his dick again in a public place like this.

Part of him wanted to try the Life Swap. If he read the remote’s guide correctly, he would still be in his body, but in her clothes and everyone would see and treat him as her. He didn’t know anything about her, or even her name, but the remote was supposed to help out with that like it did for the position and Semblance swap. Wardrobe would also be interesting to try. True, he didn’t necessarily fancy wearing dresses and girls’ clothes. It would just be funny to wear her clothes in front of his friends and have none of them notice. The thought kind of made him feel like an exhibitionist.

Personal Info was always a fun swap to use. He could change his name, position, friends, school, or even sisters. He laughed silently at the thought of the girl in red suddenly having seven sisters. How the remote would make everything seem normal and the girl in white now being his sister was sure to be entertaining. He could also be bold and try the personality swap, thought he didn’t know anything about the girl.

What swap did he make?

Jaune swaps back with Miltia in his life.
12131122132211121121211132.content:
Feeling adventurous, Jaune clicked the Life Swap button.

With a flash of light, Jaune found himself standing up next to the twin in the white dress. It was a little disconcerting to find himself halfway across a room instantly. The dress he was wearing felt weird, as it really wasn’t made for his large male body, yet it didn’t fall or slip. There was tightness on his chest he figured had to be the girl’s bra and her panties were not designed to accommodate his nether region. It was like when Yang had his dick. Things were constricted and he shifted slightly to try to ease the pressure. The high heal boots he was wearing was also uncomfortable and he was afraid he would trip when he tried to walk.

“That trash was supposed to be screened before they came in,” the girl in white huffed, walking toward the bar.

“Yeah,” Jaune said, unsure how to address the person. That word was obviously the wrong one, as the girl turned to him.

“What’s up with you, Miltia?” At least Jaune had a name now for his new life. He tried to relax the nervousness he was feeling about messing this up. It took only a moment for him to remind himself, even if he did mess it up, he could swap back without repercussions. This thought freed him a bit and he could immerse himself in the life he now had. Words came out of his mouth almost effortlessly.

“Annoyed that we get stuck picking up the slack, Mel.” Jaune replied. The other girl laughed and Jaune had a flash of insight at her name. The girl was called Melanie Malachite, nickname Mel. Obviously, both of these girls were strong-willed and confident. Miltia was a little more subdued than her sister, but that didn’t change her overall attitude that much.

“Excellent point,” Melanie agreed. “Let Junior’s thugs handle the vermin while we enjoy ourselves. Standing out here only attracts the nobodies who are stupid enough to think they have a chance with us.” She wrapped her arm with Jaune. “Let’s get drunk off our ass tonight!”

“Couldn’t agree more!” Jaune responded enthusiastically. That remark might have been more from Miltia’s life more than his desire.

He wasn’t nearly as buzzed as he had been before the swap, which implied drunkenness stayed with the life, not the body, when swapped. People parted as the two of them made their way to the bar. The normal cliental knew who they were. Jaune took the moment to glance back at Neon and Miltia in his life. The two of them were laughing and finishing their drinks. Miltia looked weird in a simple shirt and pants, compared to what she normally wore. It wasn’t like Jaune could really talk. He looked even stranger in her dress. The black fur on his shoulders felt kind of nice though. Jaune sat down next to Melanie and Jaune glanced into a mirror behind the bar.

Miltia’s face gazed back at him.

So this is how people see me, Jaune thought, as Melanie ordered them a bunch of drinks. He realized the reflection didn’t have his rabbit ears, even though he still had them. So new swaps override older ones, or maybe it’s just the life swap overriding the body. I’ll have to test it out back at Beacon. He picked up a shot glass the bartender placed in front of him, made eye contact with Melanie, and simultaneously gulped it down.

After a couple drinks, Jaune was feeling relaxed and a little buzzed. Based on the strong alcohol, he should have been a lot worse off than he was. Miltia must have developed a strong tolerance working at a club. Jaune and Melanie sat with their backs to the bar, sipping more alcoholic drinks, as they watched the other customers come and go, dance, or just socialize.

“Some of these people need to learn how to dress,” Melanie whispered to Jaune, pointing people out and laughing.

“Who dressed him, his mom?” Jaune replied. He wasn’t a mean person in the slightest normally and knew next to nothing about fashion. Living as Miltia, he just kind of knew which people didn’t dress well and had the desire to be mean to them. His onesie back at the dorm came to mind and he nearly gagged at the thought. The others were right. Regardless how comfy it is, I can’t wear it around others.

“Want to go tell them to their faces?” Melanie asked, a huge grin on her face.

“You sure you don’t want to stay here and get drunk?” Jaune asked. “Being an alcoholic and all?”

“Pssh.” Melanie sniffed indignantly. “I just know how to have a good time. You haven’t gotten laid in, what? Months? Maybe a good fucking would get that stick out of your ass.”

“Least I can remember my booty calls,” Jaune retorted. He had no idea what he was talking about. The words just flowed out without conscious thought. “You wake up next to how many guys you don’t remember meeting?”

“Bitch.”

“Skank.”

This seemed to be a common occurrence for the twins, as Melanie didn’t seem to foster any hostile feelings. Jaune didn’t either. Instead, her eyes roamed the crowd again and stopped on a group of guys who just entered the club.

“Look who just walked in,” Melanie told Jaune, licking her lips. “Seems the help outside actually listened to my instructions. I’ll make sure to tell Junior to give him a raise.”

“Oh?” Jaune didn’t know exactly what was going on at first, but his dick started hardening when he looked at the guys. Oh, fuck no. I’m finding them hot? Think of sad puppies or something! Turns out his new life would have wanted to pair up with them.

“Come on!” Melanie ordered, grabbing Jaune’s arm. “Let’s go get laid tonight.”

Jaune was out. As he was dragged across the room, he pulled out the remote, aimed at Miltia in his life, and hit the swap button.

Jaune wobbled a bit when he found himself seated next to Neon. The slight buzz he had been feeling in Militia’s life, now multiplied tenfold. Neon didn’t look much better, as she was laughing at every little thing and half her words were slurred or just outright garble. Jaune shook his head and turned toward her.

“I think we had a little to mush to drink,” Jaune told her, slurring his words.

“Hehehe, maybe!” She leaned back in her chair. “Tonight wash great! We shhould party more together while I’m here...hic”

“I think… I need to cut you off,” Jaune mumbled and they laughed. Neon slapped him lightly on the arm.

“Thosh twinsh over there,” Neon continued. “Their outfitsh are shexy ash hell.”

“One triesh sho hard,” Neon continued, swaying in her seat. “The other likesh it shimple.” Jaune had to admit she had a point. If someone compared the twins, Melanie would normally stand out with her elegant white dress. Miltia on the other hand was wearing shorts and a t-shirt. Admittingly, she filled it out much better than he did. The shorts clung to her hip and her breasts pushed at his shirt. Without a bra, the outline of her nipples were visible. Because Jaune used the remote, Miltia would still get the same attention as if she had her old clothes. “They have the right idea,” Neon suddenly exclaimed. “Let’sh go hit on guysh!”

“You’re drunk,” Jaune said and got them a couple glasses of water. “Drink up and I’m going to help you get back to Beacon.”

“I’m not ash think as you drunk I am,” Neon protested, though she drained the water down in a single gulp. Jaune chugged half of his glass and set it down before standing up and moving over to her.

Neon slept on the Bullhead ride back to Beacon while Jaune simply closed his eyes to stop the world from spinning. He didn’t get motion sick anymore, but alcohol in a moving vehicle could cause some messy situations. When they arrived at Beacon, the first order of business was finding Neon’s room. Jaune had no idea where that was or how to get a drunk Neon to tell him. As luck would have it, her team leader met them outside the main entrance.

“Hiii, Flynt!” Neon called out to a boy with dark skin and sun glasses. He was wearing a dark fedora with a blue stripe, a dark vest over an untucked white dress shirt, a loose tie wrapped around the collar, and dark dress pants.

After everything Jaune did for Neon getting her back, a little swapping was definitely in order. He clicked the Body Swap option and the world seemed to grow taller. What really happened was that he shrunk almost a foot. Neon wasn’t nearly as tall as him. Jaune looked down at himself and saw that the red dress he was wearing fit his new body much nicer than his old body. On his right arm, he noticed a rainbow tattoo wrapped around his arm ending in a star.

So tattoos are considered part of the body, Jaune thought and looked back at Neon in his body. He was walking into Beacon’s main entrance with Flynt and Neon, so he could examine her. Skipping past the weirdness that was his body in her clothes, he noticed she had her tail back and Velvet’s ears. So once I Body Part Swap, the parts will be affected by an entire Body Swap. Jaune felt rather attached to the ears. They were amazing for finding people and listening to things far away. He immediately swapped them with Neon’s ears and the sound of chatter in the distance increased. Because he liked her tail too, he swapped that back. It was rather interesting that Miltia’s dress could form a hole for the tail and patch it up when he swapped it away instantly.

I’ll see her again and give her body back when I feel like it, Jaune though and staggered a little. He was still rather drunk and the trip back only helped him sober a little. He tried to think of all the swaps he currently had going. From Ruby he had her Semblance and team. Velvet's ears adorned his head. Some random girl in Vale was perceived to be a man, Miltia’s entire wardrobe belonged to him, and now he had Neon’s entire body, including tail. So many swaps and it had only been one afternoon. It was getting late and people were beginning to retire for the night, Jaune was one of them.

The hallway to his dorm was deserted and he took the opportunity to give his new breasts a squeeze through the dress. They weren’t nearly as large as Yang’s. Neon had a sportier figure, so his hand didn’t sink into them. They were a lot firmer. Still, they felt good and he spent a minute or two rubbing them in the hallway. He didn’t want to risk testing out his lower half in case someone showed up out of nowhere. He also took a moment to look at his reflection in the scroll. Neon’s face stared back and Jaune reached up to play with his new abundant red-orange hair in four pigtails with blue bangs.

She’s really cute, Jaune thought and smiled. I love this remote so much. He paused outside of his dorm and then let himself in.

Weiss
Somebody knocking on the door.
1213112213221112112121113233112.content:
“Where have you been?”

That was the first thing that came out of Weiss’s mouth when Jaune entered the room. Her hair was let down out of the ponytail and she was wearing a short sleeve nightgown as pajamas. Blake and Yang were also in the room in their pajamas. Yang just wore a tank top and some black boy shorts while Blake had a more elegant black, long-sleeved, yukata-style shirt with white edging over a purple undershirt, and a matching skirt. Weiss was at her desk, Blake was reading on her bed, and Yang was playing some game on her scroll.

“Were you waiting for me?” Jaune asked surprised. “I left you a note.” It was not lost on him that he now had Neon's voice. Switching bodies had given him her vocal chords.

“Saying you are going to Vale is hardly informative,” Weiss pointed out. “So let me repeat, where have you been?”

“She smells like alcohol,” Blake commented and Yang bolted upright.

“Jaune actually went to a party?” Yang asked in shock. “Wow, what happened? I thought you would be reading comics all night until Weiss made you study.”

“You do the same with video games,” Blake pointed out.

“Shush, kitty cat.” Blake scowled at Yang’s comment.

“I wasn’t planning to do anything tonight,” Jaune admitted and then transitioned to a lie. “But then a friend of mine messaged me he was going to be in Vale tonight and wanted to catch up. I met them at a dance club and then we parted ways.” He scratched the back of his head. “Sort of hit it off with a girl and we went around to a couple clubs. Somehow she got us into a club called Junior’s.” Yang started coughing. “You know the place?”

“I’ve… been there once a twice,” Yang muttered, not looking at him.

“Sounds like there’s a story behind it,” Blake commented, still annoyed at Yang’s cat comment.

“You caused a lot of property damage, didn’t you?” Weiss sighed.

“That might have happened,” Yang admitted. Weiss rubbed her temples and then turned to Jaune.

“I do want to thank you for at least leaving a note for me,” she said. “Though, if you’re planning to get back late, let me know.”

“Does the same go for us, Mom?” Yang asked and Jaune snickered.

“I’m tired of people disappearing at night and none of us know where they are,” Weiss stated firmly and Blake looked guilty.

“She’s got a point,” Jaune added, before Yang could start arguing. “As a team, we should know if someone’s going to be out late. Stuff happens and we might need to cover for each other. It’s not asking much just for a message or something.” Weiss looked pleased at his insight.

“I can go along with that,” Blake said and flipped a page.

“Fine,” Yang agreed. “Thinking back, when Ruby first started going off on her own, I always wanted to know where she went.”

“Speaking of Ruby,” Jaune said, striking up conversation as he rummaged through his new wardrobe. Seriously, that girl’s clothes are like ninety percent dresses, and they’re all shades of red. “How was the movie with her team?” He pulled out a dark semitransparent nightgown and started changing. It was a good thing he switched back to being a girl. Weiss would not have accepted a guy changing in front of them. His bra and underwear were a darker shade of red and were probably expensive. He wished he had some alone time to explore his new body.

“The movie was pretty good,” Yang replied. “Lots of action with enough romance scenes for Blake and Pyrrha.” Blake flushed slightly. “Who knew Pyrrha was such a big fan of that stuff? Next thing you know she’ll be over here borrowing Blake’s smut.”

“Then maybe I can find someone who appreciates good literature,” Blake said, keeping her voice calm.

“Did the library have that book?” Jaune asked Weiss, as he climbed up to his bed.

“Yes, thank you.” She looked up at him. “You might need to use it though, as I got the last copy. Don’t put off your work to the last minute.”

“I won’t,” Jaune promised and laid back in his bed. “We have training tomorrow and I’ll do my homework after that.” He leaned forward. “You know Yang’s going to try to get us to go somewhere tomorrow night.”

“It’s your fault,” Weiss stated matter-of-factly. “Coming back from a club and not inviting her. Besides, you’re the team leader. You’re supposed to think of teamwork building activities.”

“I can hear you!” Yang called over. “Jaune and Blake aren’t the only one with good hearing. I trained preventing Ruby from sneaking into the kitchen and stealing cookies.”

“That sounds fun,” Jaune said and then yawned. His fatigue was reaching his limit and he reached up to undo the ties in his hair. As part of the hair swap, some information on haircare seemed to be swapped too. “I can totally see Ruby doing something like that.”

“I love her,” Yang replied. “But she was a handful and I’m not used to leaving her alone. I’m trying to, but it’s tough.”

I can give you a little break, Jaune thought and clicked the remote, swapping sisters with Yang. Have fun with…seven… Everything went dark as Jaune crashed. The next thing he knew, someone was trying to wake him up.

Who was it?
