She loved her outgoing personality but she knew it won't work for her during class. She was one of the better students and she couldn't let that go. One on hand she enjoyed partying as hard as Yang but on the other she knew it wasn't her. "I'm sorry Yang, I know you like party hard Blake" She sighed and pressed the button and in a flash she was back to normal.

Yang came out of the bathroom, walking over to her wardrobe and stripping. "C'mon Blake! We're going to miss breakfast if you don't get that lazy butt out of bed" She exclaimed as she picked out her usual attire.

Blake sighed and got out of bed, walking into the bathroom. She stopped at the mirror and stared at her reflection. "What are you doing Blake, what has this remote done?" She asked herself. She looked over to Yang, who was sitting on her bed and looking over the remote.

1523222112232123131.content:
“So….” Yang prodded, as they walked down to the cafeteria. “Any idea yet?”

“I told you, I’m thinking.” Blake huffed.

This remote had so much potential Maybe she could use it to help Faunus and Human relations. Though, exploring the lives of others was always a fun idea. She couldn’t lie to herself that it was tempting. Even looking back at the twins, being able to do something like drinking and parting with Yang all night long was something she never expected to experience. She also got a glimpse into what Jaune’s life was like, even if she didn’t enjoy being so timid.

“There’s Pyrrha.” Yang muttered, elbowing Blake. “Pass the remote, Blake.”

“I have to touch it to notice it too.” Blake reminded her, handing over the remote.

Jaune and Pyrrha were talking in the hallway about something and Blake wasn’t trying to spy on them with her heightened sense of hearing. Both of them were dressed in their combat clothes, though didn’t have weapons. Most likely they were going to train a bit after breakfast since it was Sunday. Yang however, immediately aimed at Pyrrha and did a Body Swap. Now Yang was standing over talking to Jaune, wearing Pyrrha’s red and gold Spartan style armor and skirt. All fitted to her proportions.

“Wow,” Yang whispered, flexing in Pyrrha’s body. “I feel amazing. I’m pretty strong, but Pyrrha’s much more limber with the muscles backing it up.”

It was kind of weird for Blake to see Pyrrha act like Yang, even though she knew this was Yang with Pyrrha’s body. Yang flipped Pyrrha’s red ponytail back and looked down. She was still wearing tan jacket with yellow crop top under it, revealing her navel though it adjusted to fit Pyrrha’s frame. The brown belt and black miniskirts also adjusted to fit Pyrrha’s frame.

“You know you probably won’t beat her,” Blake pointed out. “Your Semblance, skills, weapons, none of that swaps with a Body Swap. It’s literally just the body. Everyone should just believe you’ve always looked like that.”

“So you need something bigger than just a girl swapping with a girl…” The smile appearing on Yang’s face did not bode well for Blake. “I dare you to swap bodies with Jaune.”

Blake blinked, thinking she misheard.

“…What?”

“Body Swap… with Jaune.” Yang repeated slowly. “Come on, Blake. With all those smut stories you read, I bet you’re dying to check out a male’s body. Maybe we can see why Pyrrha likes him so much.”

“Pretty sure that’s not the reason.” Blake muttered, rubbing her nose.

The worst part? Blake was tempted. She had Life Swapped with Jaune a little bit, but didn’t get to experience the true form of a boy. Jaune was also one of the only guys she talked to recently, besides Sun. There was no way she was swapping with him. Even if he would believe he always had her body, the thought of what he would do with it if he found out. Jaune would at least take care of her body, minus some of the junk food he ate.

“I dared you,” Yang pressed on. “Do it, Blake. Step out of your comfort zone and have some fun.”

“…Okay.” Blake agreed.

“Knew you wouldn’t, guess we can find… what?” Yang’s head cracked as she turned instantly to look at her partner.

“I’ll do it.” Blake said. “You’re right. It’s time to step out of my comfort zone and experience new things.”

She raised the remote and Yang quickly touched it before Blake hit the button. There was a flash of light and Blake then saw herself wearing Jaune’s hoodie and jeans, talking to Pyrrha, who looked like Yang. Blake was momentarily worried because her body had ears showing, but quickly dismissed it. Everyone saw her body as Jaune’s for now. So there was nothing unusual to anyone.

“Pfft!”

Yang’s laughter caused Blake to sigh and looked down at herself. She was still wearing her white and black outfit, including the vest and sleeveless shirt. However, when she looked down, instead of seeing her chest, she saw a broader male one. She was also much taller now with Jaune’s body. She touched her head and felt the short hair, minus the cat ears, though the bow was still there. Lastly, she felt how tight her shorts were. They adjusted to fit Jaune’s body, but he had equipment her female shorts were not made to contain and it was pressed tightly against her leg.

She blushed as Yang laughed.

“Well, want to see how Ruby and Weiss react?” Yang asked, still laughing.

“I suppose we should.” Blake agreed.

1523222112232123131312312222211321311213.content:
“It’s tough to decide,” Blake admitted. “You’ll do just about anything without issue.”

“Hah, you know it.” Yang replied with a grin.

In all honesty, Blake hadn’t been thinking about it. She had been watching Weiss to see what she would do now that she didn’t have Jaune’s body. Maybe Weiss wasn’t as sexually attracted to her anymore. Though, she had the memories of what happened last night with her original body now. It was possible now that Weiss asked her out and she accepted, she wasn’t as nervous anymore. She would have to wait and see what happens on Friday. Or if Weiss mentions it during the week.

For now, she really should focus on Yang.

The question was what to swap?

Naturally, Yang was more outgoing than Blake was. She wouldn’t consider a simple swap a dare and laugh at Blake’s attempt. If she swapped him with a guy, Yang would just constantly make dick jokes. Yang might suffer a little if she swapped her on Cardin’s team, but then Blake would have to deal with one of his teammates as her partner. That was more of a punishment for her. Blake had to think.

Yang did say she wasn’t interested in swapping personalities with Weiss. That might be fun to see. Though, if they swapped personalities, would Yang like her or was that just started because of Blake’s male body. Weiss had asked her out, so a personality swap shouldn’t change that.

Still, it seemed tame.

What was a better punishment? What did Blake not like?

The answer hit her like a ton of bricks.

The demon!

Blake immediately thought about Zwei, Ruby's pet corgi. What if Yang swapped with him? Maybe the body? Or a Life Swap. Or owner? Ruby would treat Yang like a pet and maybe Zwei as a sister? Personal Info swaps were supposed to have some unexpected results.

Blake looked around for more inspiration before finally making her decision.

Blake couldn’t help chuckling as the two of them headed toward class.

It took a minute to compose herself. “I just have to remember everyone still sees it as normal and none of the guys will worry about it. Least I have my uniform.” Seeing Zwei wear a skirt was kind of funny too.

“Well, my body is hot enough that the guys are sure to notice,” Yang admitted. “Maybe I can make fun of Jaune or Ren if I see them looking.”

“If you last.”

“I don’t know, having heightened smell and hearing is kind of nic-…AHHH!”

Her ears flattened against her head as the bell rang. The noise bothered Blake too due to her cat ears, but she was used to it. There was a problem though.

They were late!

“Nice of you to join us, Miss Belladonna, Miss Xiao-Long.” Their teacher Glynda Goodwitch told them as they raced in. Out of all their teachers, she was the strictest and did not tolerate tardiness. She was also in charge of combat class.

“What kept you two?” Weiss whispered.

“Yang forgot something back at the dorm and made me come with her.” Blake lied.

“Ah, sounds like her.” Ruby said with condolences.

Yang’s opponent was Nora Valkyrie, a hyperactive ginger. While short, she was incredibly strong and wielded a giant hammer that could become a grenade launcher.
https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/rwby...

Yang emerged and Blake had to stifle her laughter with one hand. On the arena floor, Zwei was wearing Yang’s combat attire and had tiny little gauntlets on his front paws while he walked on all fours. Yes, Blake knew it was Yang, but at the same time, this excited her on two fronts. The first was Blake hated that dog and watching it lose was satisfying. Second, it was Yang and this was payback for all the teasing that happened yesterday.

There was no way Yang could win in her current state, was there?

1523222112232123131312312222211321311213.content:
Normally Yang was the one to spar with Pyrrha. Both of them were the top of the year. Then Nora and Blake would be slightly below them. Too many times Blake had been on the receiving end of the energetic ginger’s hammer. Then there was the case of which Pyrrha’s Semblance was polarity. She could literally control metal, which meant her weapons were useless. The only thing was she didn’t use it openly, so Blake only had to worry about small adjustments to her weapon. Still, it meant she was never really going to get a good hit on Pyrrha.

“Good luck.” Pyrrha said as they took their place.

“You too.” Blake replied. The nice thing was Pyrrha never rubbed it in. She was a hard worker and always treated people with respect.

“Begin!” Glynda announced.

Blake kept her distance and fired a barrage of bullets at Pyrrha. Most reflected off her shield as she closed the gap. A few glanced off her Aura doing minimal damage. Pyrrha jabbed her spear into Blake, which she just managed to dodge, only o get knocked back with a shield bash. Blake pushed off the ground to minimize the impact, but Pyrrha was not a slouch. She charged forward and kept delivering blow after blow to keep Blake from stabilizing.

A jab went straight through her and Blake’s body shimmered before running red.

Pyrrha’s eyes widened in shock as an explosion engulfed her.

Blake was on the other side of the area now. Her Semblance to clone herself to take attacks was a handy skill. Combining it with Dust added additional affects, such as fire making explosions. She could hear Ruby cheer, but couldn’t rest yet. The battle was far from over.

From the smoke, a shield flew at her and Blake ducked, only to see Pyrrha already on her. That was a champion for you. She never let her opponent set the pace. Blake got hit cleanly and a good chunk of her Aura went down. She dodged a fatel blow with her clone and struck back. Only for her blade to miss by inches due to her Semblance. She then was hit several more times in the space of only a few seconds.

“Winner, Miss Nikos!” Glynda declared.

Blake put her weapon away and sat back down.

“Now you know what I go through.” Yang said to Blake in an ‘I told you so’ manner. “That’s why I hate fighting her.”

“That explosion was awesome!” Ruby assured Blake. “She didn’t see that coming at all.”

“I have to thank Weiss for lending me some Dust a few days ago to practice that,” Blake admitted. Weiss smiled and her cheeks turned ever so slightly pink. Was that a sign there was still affects from the previous day’s swap?

“Miss Rose vs Mr. Ren.” Glynda called out.

“I’m up!” Ruby cheered and zipped down the stairs.

“So?” Yang pushed, her small puppy paws on the table. She was sitting on a book so she could see. “Let me swap.”

“I said after class.” Blake muttered. “Besides, you got your second swap. You can talk.”

“That was your choice so you could understand me.” Yang pointed out.

“Fine,” Blake conceded. “What did you want? The same rule that applied to me though. No swapping out of the body.”

“Damn…” Yang muttered darkly. It was obvious to Blake that’s what she was planning. “What about lives?”

“I suppose that’s okay,” Blake admitted. “People would see you as whoever you target, but you would still have Zwei’s body.”

“Hmm, I kind of want to try personality swap too,” Yang admitted. “Might help with my situation.”

“Mmmhmm.” Blake murmured uncommittedly.

“Though, Personal Information could have so much fun,” Yang continued. “Swapping with someone who has a relationship. Always wanted to know if Coco and Velvet were like that. Maybe Pyrrha’s Semblance too. Would make grabbing and moving things easier.”

Blake was a little disappointed Yang was adjusting so easy to Zwei’s body.

1523222112232123131312312222211321311213.content:
“What’s with the remote?” Weiss asked and Blake jumped.

She had forgotten she was there.

“Umm…” Blake thought quickly and Yang’s new dog ears twitched. She heard everything. “I caught Yang trying to program our stuff with this universal remote. She was planning to mess with us.”

“Kitty Kay caught me.” Yang muttered, playing along.

“I see.” Weiss looked a little suspicious, but the lie was actually believable. It was something Yang would do and Blake was the type of person who didn’t want that girl controlling their TV and other electronics. Weiss’ eyes met Blake’s for a moment and her cheeks flushed before looking back down at the arena.

Blake began to realize Weiss had been purposely avoiding her.

Is she embarrassed over last night? Blake thought, but she couldn’t push the issue now. They were in class and that kind of situation had to be talked about in private. As far as Blake knew, they still had that ‘date’ on Friday.

Blake spent the rest of class absentmindedly watching the fights or watching Yang text Coco. Even with Zwei’s puppy paws, Yang was still able to text easily. Weiss glanced over at Blake once for half a second before deliberately avoiding eye contact again. Blake kept the remote hidden now too, as if Weiss kept seeing it, she might suspect it was more than a simple prank. Questions would be asked that she did not want to answer.

“Finally!” Yang cheered as the bell rang. “Food and then I need to go meet Coco.” She hopped down off the stool and walked next to her team.

“I’m starving too.” Ruby said. “Ren was tough.”

“Someone had to win from our team today,” Weiss commented. “Good job, Ruby.”

“You didn’t fight,” Yang pointed out, as they entered the cafeteria. “Blake had to fight P-money and I just had an off day. You fight her and see how well you do.”

“Pyrrha, aside,” Weiss continued quickly. “You did seem off today. Make sure you rest up and practice more.”

“Whatever.” Yang rolled her eyes.

“I still have to finish that essay for Oobleck.” Ruby sighed. “Weiss won’t let me copy.”

“You need to learn to do your own work,” Weiss huffed. “Yang tried to copy my work too.”

“Learn to share.” Yang muttered.

“Weiss is right,” Blake said, cutting her fish. “You won’t learn otherwise.” Weiss nodded in thanks, glad someone was on her side.

"I'm fine, I just have a lot on my mind" Blake replied removing Weiss' hand. "So what should we do Friday?"

1523222112232123131312312222211321311213.content:
Blake normally didn’t get many chances to talk to Weiss alone. They… hadn’t hit it off very well early on. As much as Blake wanted people to see her for her, not for her being a Faunus. She hated to say that she judged Weiss as a Schnee who looked down at Faunus before getting to know her. Things had not been pretty, but they finally settled down and the two of them became friends. Thanks a lot to their innocent younger team leader.

“Weiss, can I ask you something?” Blake said, glancing up

“Huh?” Weiss looked up from her Scroll. “Sure.”

Blake hesitated a little bit. She had to ask because her own memories were a little blurry. This was also a chance to learn more about Weiss in this reality and how Blake being in Jaune’s body changed things. It was still awkward though.

“Skipping over last night…” That was embarrassing for both of them and Weiss flushed. “When did you… er… start having feels for me?”

Weiss blinked and looked surprised at the question. Her Scroll lowered as she thought about Blake’s question.

“I’m not sure when it started,” She finally answered slowly. “I guess I always thought you were attractive in a way. More so than Yang… but don’t tell her I think she’s even a little bit attractive.”

“Lips are sealed. Her ego is inflated enough as is.”

Weiss shared a small laugh with Blake and then continued.

“I think after the incident with… your old organization and we finally talked, I realized I liked you… more as a friend.” Weiss took a deep breath. “You weren’t afraid to talk back to me. Not in an insulting way, but pointing out when I was mistaken. Most people would either just agree due to my family name, or just argue for the sake of arguing. I don’t like admit when I’m wrong, but I can do it.”

“You apologized to Ruby,” Blake remembered. “And you also forgave me after I ran off without explaining myself.” Her eyes lowered for a moment. “I think… being in Beacon, away from your environment back home… has been good for you. Both of us actually.”

“I… think so too.” Weiss agreed. “It was strange to adjust, but I like it hear. I like our team. I like you…” She flushed again. “Team JNPR is nice too, even if Arc is annoying.” Her eyes brightened. “If things go well this Friday… maybe he will give up.”

“I’ve talked to him before,” Blake said. “Besides some confidence issues, he’s considerate. Your initial reactions to it might have been a little over the top. It would have been better to be honest and just tell him you don’t feel that way about him.”

“Wish I had known this then.” She sighed. “I was afraid of asking you, you know? I realized how much courage Arc… Jaune had in asking me after all those rejections. It’s nerve wrecking.”

“Might have been easier since we were both half asleep.” Blake admitted, causing Weiss to nod.

Their talks sort of died out as Weiss checked her Scroll and Blake turned to her book. Though, her brain was thinking more of what she just learned. Weiss liked her in this world for a while, and Blake had no way to confirm if that was true before the Body Swap. She might have to be careful about swaps in the future. Either way, Blake wasn’t sure what she thought about this. Few people knew that Blake was bi and actually liked girls and boys. Weiss was very attractive in her own right too. The Schnee were known for their almost ethereal beauty.

Then a Schnee and a Faunus was certain to draw some raised eyebrows once Blake came out.

“I think I’m going to take advantage of the quiet room and read,” Blake replied. “Thank you. Maybe next time?” They nodded and headed out while Blake decided what to do.

154.content:
The door to Team JNPR’s door opened with a bang and the hyperactive ginger barged in.
http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/p__/...

“Guys!” Nora Valkyrie called out to the rest of the team. “Stop what you’re doing!” The door slammed shut behind her.

“What kept you?” The tall, blonde haired leader of the team, Jaune Arc, asked. “You’re the one who wanted to go Grimm hunting today.”

“We were just about to go look for you,” Pyrrha Nikos added. She had just put on the bronze circlet under her bright red hair.

“Skip the Grimm hunting,” Nora ordered, waving her hand dismissively. “I got something better.” At her words, the other two turned to the final member of their team in shock. Ren, the resident ninja sitting on the edge of his bed in a green tailcoat.

“I’m not sure why you two are looking at me,” he said to them and then turned to Nora. “Are you feeling okay?”

“I’m just great, Renny.” Nora bounced on her feet anxiously. “You see, I found something amazing just laying in the grass.” She pulled a hand from behind her back and help up a small black device. “Tada! The most powerful object in the universe!”

“A remote?” Pyrrha asked. “What’s so special about it?” This wouldn’t be the first time Nora over exaggerated about something. However, her stories were always entertaining so she wanted to hear more.

“It has the power to swap things between people. Bodies, names, even lives,” Nora bragged and then looked downtrodden as none of her teammates looked all that impressed. “Come on! This is amazing! Think of all the fun we could have!”

“Are you sure you don’t want to lie down?” Ren asked, his brow furrowing slightly. “I’ll make you something to eat.”

“I’m not sick!” Nora protested and held up a pamphlet. “It even came with instructions.” She pushed it into Jaune’s hands before he could say anything. “Take a look, Fearless Leader.” Jaune smiled indulgently and scanned through the paper.

“This sounds like a scam,” Jaune muttered softly. “Still, these instructions seem rather detailed.” He handed the paper to Pyrrha. “What do you think, Pyr?”

“I don’t see how this could work,” Pyrrha admitted, after reading it and passing it onto Ren. “This is impossible. It defies every law of physics.”

“Sounds like a child’s toy,” Ren agreed, after he read it. “Have you tried it out, Nora?”

“Yep!” Nora beamed at him. “I swapped hair with Yang.” She brushed back her long golden hair that reached her waist. “Didn’t you guys notice?”

“But you’ve always had blonde hair,” Jaune pointed out. “Always surprised it doesn’t get in the way of fighting since you don’t pull it back like Pyrrha.”

“That’s because it’s not mine,” Nora explained. “Here, hold the remote while I hit the Reset Button.” The others shared a look and obliged. It wasn’t like Nora was giving them a choice. Jaune, Pyrrha, and Ren placed a hand on the remote and Nora hit a button. There was a flash of green light and then nothing.

“So what… Nora, you’re hair!” Pyrrha gasped.

“Right, it’s supposed to be short and orange,” Jaune remembered.

“This is astounding,” Ren added.

“If you hold the remote you remember the changes,” Nora reminded them, as they had all read the instructions. “I wasn’t sure if the Reset Button would make you remember a swap you weren’t there for if you were touching it, but it looks like it did.”

“Sorry we didn’t believe you,” Jaune apologized. “There was no reason for you to make something like this up.”

“Sorry,” Pyrrha agreed.

“Good.” Nora crossed her arms and gazed at them superiority. “As long as you learned your lesson.”

“So what did you have planned for this remote?” Ren asked and there was a tiny bit of nervousness to his voice.

“Team bonding exercise!” Nora answered immediately.

“Team bonding exercise?” The others repeated.
154.title: Nora

choices: Wardrobes

Weapons
1542.content:
“We can each swap something with someone on another team,” Nora explained, bouncing slightly on her feet.

“You sure you don’t want to test it out among us?” Jaune asked wearily.

“That would be fun too,” Nora agreed. “But it would be so much more exciting to swap with another team.” She looked at the other two. “Plllleeeeeeeaaassseee.”

“It would be a change of pace,” Pyrrha admitted slowly. “And, Jaune. Didn’t you say you were tired out from combat class?”

“I’m a little sore,” he confirmed and nodded. He bit the corner of his lip in thought. “Actually, this does sound like fun. I mean, what’s the chance we would find something like this.”

“That’s what I’m saying!” Nora cheered. All three of them looked at Ren, who sighed.

“She’s going to do it regardless,” Ren told the others. “We might as well go along with it. I won’t lie and say I’m not curious about the powers this device holds.”

“So it’s agreed!” Nora wore a bright smile as she beamed at her friends. “I think I got the perfect targets too.”

“Why?” Jaune asked. “We know them at least, right?”

“Team RWBY.”

“Team RWBY?” Pyrrha raised an eyebrow. “I mean, they are right across the hallway so they would be easy targets.”

“Heh,” Jaune laughed. “Nora, you find the weirdest things to keep us entertained.”

“Aww!” Nora hugged him, nearly breaking his bones with her monstrous strength. “You’re the best team leader too.”

“This won’t cause any lasting effects, right?” Ren asked. As the one who has cleaned up Nora’s messes for years, he had to ask.

“That’s what the Undo and Reset buttons are for,” Nora replied, pointing to the buttons. “With one click, everything goes back to normal.”

“Convenient,” Pyrrha commented.

“What should we swap with them?” Jaune asked, picking up the pamphlet and skimming it again.

“How about whatever we decide, everyone swaps the same thing?” Pyrrha suggested. “One for one. That way we can all see what something is like.”

“That’s an awesome idea,” Nora agreed instantly.

“I'm okay with this plan,” Ren added,

“Put it to a vote like usual?” There was a murmur of agreement and everyone made their suggestion on what they should swap with Team RWBY. After about five minutes of debating, the consensus was…

“So we all have to be holding the remote,” Jaune reiterated. “Try not to swap without us, Nora. Otherwise, we won’t notice the changes.”

“Righty-o!” Nora saluted and Jaune rolled his eyes.

“At least we managed to choose a relatively safe option,” Ren assured him. “Clothes were probably the safest bet.”

“I don’t know,” Pyrrha interjected, as Nora peered out their door to across the hall. “I think names would have been fun and safe.”

“Yeah, but we needed something a little more… significant,” Jaune replied. “I just don’t think Nora’s suggestion of bodies was… appropriate for Ren and me.”

“And now you get to wear female clothes,” Pyrrha pointed out with a laugh.

“Wouldn’t be the first time,” Jaune and Ren muttered. They glanced at each other and shared a moment of male bonding. Jaune had seven sisters and, when he was younger, he was forced to wear girl’s clothes. Ren was childhood friends with Nora. Nora once replaced all of his clothes with her own because she thought he would look cute in them.

“I have an idea,” Nora suddenly suggested. She was still a little disappointed they wouldn’t switch bodies. She wanted to examine Yang’s muscles and see if she really was fitter than her. “What if we do it randomly?”

“What do you mean, randomly?” Ren asked.

“I swap with the first person to leave their room,” Nora suggested. “Then Pyrrha, than, Ren, than Jauney. Whichever member of team RWBY leaves in that order is who we swap with.” Jaune nodded his head slightly.

“I’m okay with that,” he admitted. “It’s going to be awkward regardless of who I get.” Ren and Pyrrha didn’t have any objections either. “Why am I last though?”

“To save the best for last, duh.”

“Right…” Pyrrha giggled at Jaune’s confusion.

The four of them waited behind the door while Nora peaked out. They could hear Team RWBY talking loudly behind their closed door, but their words were muffled. It sounded like they were going to leave soon. Nora fidgeted excitedly as she waited. All members of Team JNPR had their hand on the remote and waited. After about five minutes, the door opened and the girls across the hall left. There were four clicks followed by green flashes of light.

Who swapped with who?

Underneath it was a white, sleeveless, high necked, crop undershirt and white shorts. He also had black low-heeled boots and full stockings with a color gradation of black to purple at the ankles. Nora giggled at his outfit and hugged him.

“You look great, Renny!” Ren’s lips tugged upwards slightly in an embarrassed smile. Blake had been the second person to leave.

“I don’t know if white really suits me,” Pyrrha said, glancing at the mirror as she opened the closet. She was wearing Weiss’ white combat dress along with a bolero with the same color scheme. “And nearly all of Weiss’s outfits are white or light blue.” At least they were rather conservative so Pyrrha wasn’t too embarrassed. It was still disconcerting to see someone else’s clothes where her clothes had been hanging up moments before.

“You look great,” Jaune reassured her. “At least your dress covers everything. I’m not used to such revealing clothes. Sheesh, Yang.” Jaune tried to pull the tan jacket that bared his midriff down. Under it was a low cut yellow crop top that was pressed tightly against his skin. If he had breasts, they would have had a good portion of them being revealed. His other hand tried to pull the black short shorts down a little bit. His male parts were severely restricted and Pyrrha had to make sure he didn’t catch her looking.

“Yang’s clothes…snk… really suit you?” Pyrrha tried to say with a straight face.

“Hahaha,” Jaune laughed sarcastically and pushed Pyrrha on the shoulder. “Very funny. At least her shoes are normal.” He pointed to the brown, knee-high boots and orange over-the-knee socks. He suddenly frowned and adjusted his tank top, or something underneath it. “This is so constricting.”

“Aww,” Nora teased. “Is our fearless leader having trouble with a bra?”

“I don’t even need one,” Jaune protested as Nora and Pyrrha laughed. “But the remote adjusted all of the clothes to fit us.” His face suddenly grew red as he imagined Yang bouncing around without a bra.

“I have to admit,” Ren added. “This is a little uncomfortable.”

“You learn to deal with it,” Nora replied with a shrug and Pyrrha’s face flushed. While that was true, speaking about women’s underwear with Ren and Jaune was rather embarrassing. It was rather amusing to see the boys struggle with something the girls considered essential.

1551.content:
(This chain may contain more graphic scenes than the previous ones due to Cardin not being an outstanding individual.)

Cardin was not in a good mood, even though he should have been. He had finished pummeling Jaune Arc in combat class not even an hour ago. The problem was their professor, Glynda Goodwitch, kept on going on about the mistakes ‘he’ had made, not Jaune. It was like she didn’t see how easily he defeated his opponent. Sure, Jaune had helped Cardin out once with an Ursa, but that was a long time ago. As thanks, Cardin didn’t bully him directly. That didn’t mean he would hold back in combat class. Also, there was a little bit of jealousy fueling Cardin’s irritation during the practice battles.

Not only was Jaune’s partner skilled and attractive, he was close friends with team RWBY, who was full of some of the hottest girls in the year. Cardin’s team was full of guys. Sure, they had similar interests and joked around at other people’s expense, but Cardin would have liked to be on the same team as a couple girls. A lot of accidental mishaps could arise when you lived together.

“Life’s not fair at all,” Cardin muttered, kicking a rock. He was walking across Beacon’s campus, debating what to do. Two of his team members had detention for failing to turn in their homework and the third was trying to fix his weapon that got damaged during class today. That left Cardin to do whatever he wanted by himself. Something sparkled in the distance and it peaked his interest. “A remote?” Cardin muttered confused, reaching down to pick it up. Below it was a folded up pamphlet of some kind. The title was clearly visible.

Your Guide to the Swapping Remote

Something compelled him to read the pamphlet and his eyes grew wider with each word.

“No way in hell. No way in hell is this real. Some asshole’s pranking me.” Cardin glanced around, yet no one was there. He was farther away from the main buildings, so not a lot of people came this way. “I know this is fake, it has to be, but…”

He trailed off.

It was too tempting to ignore. His imagination showed him all the fun adventures and swaps he could do. Not only could he use it to spy on all the ridiculously attractive girls in Beacon, he could even swap his team around with them. He could rule the school and do pretty much whatever he wanted. Testing the remote became a priority. If it didn’t work, he would throw it away. If it did work… well, let’s just say he was going to enjoy himself.

15512.content:
Cardin knew who his first target was going to be.

Pyrrha Nikos, the invincible girl.
https://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/rwb...

Pyrrha was a girl his age and the partner of Jaune Arc. Her nickname came from the fact she never lost a match. One time, Cardin’s entire team was trashed by her in combat class. She was fast, agile, and all attacks seemed to just miss her. Not only talented, she was a beauty. Long red hair, bright green eyes, along with a full figure combined with her combat skills made her an attractive icon for sponsors. A lot of guys at the school tried asking her out and she kept turning them down. For some reason, she was attracted to Jaune and Cardin could understand why.

I’m stronger and smarter than him, Cardin thought to himself, as he began to scour the school for his target. And now I have this remote. I can’t wait to test it out on her. She shouldn’t have rejected me. It took a while to locate his target, as Pyrrha usually kept to herself. Everyone knew where she was if she didn’t because of her fame.

After about twenty minutes of searching, he finally found her.

There you are, Cardin though excitedly, watching her exit the locker rooms. She turned down a hallway and was walking away from him. Now or never. No one else was nearby and he took the opportunity. His finger came down on the remote.

Which button did he use?

155122.content:
There was a flash of green light and Cardin’s mouth fell open.

He saw himself walking away from him. The person in front of him was an exact match, even the school uniform consisting of a black suits lined with gold, white shirt, and red tie. Cardin looked down at himself and saw two large mounds on his chest covered by a lot more white shirt than he was used too. There was also a draft between his legs because of a red skirt and long black stockings covered his, now thin and feminine, legs. His head felt heavy and he reached up to discover long red hair tied up in a ponytail. Stunned disbelief overtook him for a moment and then a grin exploded onto his face.

“It works!” He cried out, fist pumping the air with his free hand.

“Excuse me?” Cardin stopped when Pyrrha in his body and clothes turned around. He had forgotten she hadn’t known he was there. His voice drew her attention. “Cardin?”

“Wasn’t talking to you, Nikos,” Cardin replied hastily. “Dealing with an issue on my scroll.” He shoved the remote in his pocket as he said that.

“Oh, okay.” There was a slight negative change in her expression as she looked at him before turning away and leaving. Cardin made sure she was really gone before reaching up and cupping one of his new breasts.

“I knew that bitch’s chest was nice, but daaaam.” He spent a few minutes working his hand through the clothes and enjoying the pleasure coming from his breast. His other hand reached down and felt between his legs to discover his manhood was gone. Touching his underwear cause a sharp spike of pleasure when he got too close to Pyrrha’s vagina. “Fuck!”

He had to stop himself before he went too far.

It wasn’t like he was worried about Pyrrha’s body. No, it was the fact others would still see him as Cardin and the last thing he needed was for someone to catch him masturbating in the hallways. He was smarter than that. Turning around and heading in the opposite direction of Pyrrha, he had time to think. The lack of manhood and a slightly bouncy chest felt off, but not unpleasant. A bra was holding his new assets in place quite well.

“I still can't believe this remote actually works,” Cardin muttered.

Part of him never really believed it would, so he didn’t plan out a next step. Naturally, the first thing he wanted to do was check out his new body. With the rest of his team busy, he probably had a good hour to himself. Pyrrha was a looker and it was his chance to examine her body up close and personal. Another option was to use the remote and get onto a new team, one full of girls. If he swapped himself with that young girl Ruby, he would have three of the hottest girls in their year on his team. However, if he swapped places with Jaune, his partner would be the strongest and one of the most attractive girls at Beacon. Shoot, he could even confess and Pyrrha would be all over him.

So many choices.

1551222.content:
Cardin had every intention of getting back at Pyrrha with his newfound device. He still would but what was the rush? She wasn't going anywhere any time soon and he had an entire school of babes to experiment with. His own year, second years, seniors. Hell, there were professors he could imagine parading around as. To be Goodwitch and haul that impressive chest around?

A lecherous grin wholly out of place on Pyrrha's face appeared. Taking another quick glance around he licked his lips and seized one of his breasts, groping it roughly with a melodic laugh. "I'll have all the time in the world to get back at you later, bitch. Maybe I'll pop by tonight for some fun."

For now though? With Beacon ripe for his experiments there were, surprisingly to him, more pressing things than his revenge. Scouring the device for an "Undo" button he clicked it, although not before giving his stolen rear a hearty spank. Down the hall and now back in his own body he laughed hearing Pyrrha gasp, totally oblivious to why her ass was now stinging. Throwing a knowing smile over his shoulder Cardin waved, twirled the remote in his hand, and headed off to find his next host.

There were plenty of options. Brothers know the school wasn't wanting for attractive girls. His fleeting taste of Pyrrha had left him wanting and he definitely needed to find himself someone comparable. Or hell, someone he could use to get closer to someone comparable. An all girls team for sure, of which there were frustratingly few. Again his mind went back to the pipsqueak Ruby Rose. She was cute enough he supposed, although more of a 'cute girl next door' kind of girl than one he'd lust over. Her teammates though? Blake Belladonna was an exotic beauty, Yang Xiao Long was stacked, and Weiss? Beautiful and loaded. He could swap into any of those three and be satisfied. Or, he could play the part of Yang's dopey little sister and cause a little chaos.

Chaos sounded fun. He could rile up "his" team, cause problems for them, and get while the going was good. Maybe jump into one of the other girls once Ruby was thoroughly done for. He didn't have much of a vendetta against the brunette, nothing like how he felt about Pyrrha, which honestly made it easier. He just didn't care enough one way or another.

Getting to team RWBY's dorm was the only obstacle. By virtue of all first years being on the same floor, in the same wing, it wasn't difficult finding it. Most of his peers steered clear and he even managed to pass Pyrrha on his way over, winking at her and puckering his lips, snickering as he stepped into her own room with a look of barely restrained disgust.

Don't you worry, Nikos. We'll have plenty of fun soon enough.

RWBY's room was directly across JNPR's, and once the coast was clear Cardin walked up and knocked. Banged, really, stepping back and taking out his remote. Hopefully the bulge wasn't too obvious in his trousers, not that he much cared. It would be someone else's problem to deal with soon enough. Grinning, he raised the remote as soon as he heard the doorknob turn, waiting until the door opened before firing away.

15512221.content:
There was a flash of green light. Cardin had hit the button immediately without even checking who it was. The next moment, he was standing in the room facing outwards, instead of outside the room staring in. He had hit the Life Swap option and it took a second to get used to the sudden location swap. According to the instructions, he should now be seen as the girl he targeted, Glancing down, he saw a red and black dress. Knowing who this dress belonged to, his eyes moved forward to see who was living in his life.

It was Ruby Rose.

She was wearing his clothes and sported his brown hair. That must have meant he had her short black hair. The girl was sneering at him like Cardin would have done. She should believe that she WAS him and everyone should see her as him. Still, it took a lot of self-control not to burst out laughing as she was so short and hardly intimidating. He didn’t see her as himself.

“What do you want?” Cardin asked, trying to sound like her. It actually felt kind of natural. The instructions did saw Life Swaps would help with that.

“Just checking to see if you’re still in school and not kicked out yet.” Ruby laughed with a sneer.

“Go away R… Cardin!” He almost said Ruby, but he quickly changed direction. Ruby laughed, before turning and walking away.

That’s when he got an idea.

If he was going to do this, might as well do it all the way. He did a Body Swap and soon found himself in Ruby’s body. The world seemed much bigger now as he lost a foot or two. He felt so small and weak. How this girl could beat him was beyond him. She was either lucky or it was because of that monstrosity she called a weapon. He slammed the door and turned around to check out the room. It looked pretty normal, though they had bunk beds, with one bed strung up with some horrid contraption. There was only one girl in the room right now.

“What did…Cardin… want?” Weiss asked in disgust.

“Just being a jerk.” Cardin replied, letting Ruby’s life guide him. Seems they insulted him a lot. He would have to make them pay for that.

“How he was even allowed in is beyond me.” Weiss muttered, turning back to her desk and paper she was working on.

Cardin glanced into the mirror and saw himself looking exactly like Ruby. The evil grin on her face was definitely not her usually one though. Weiss didn’t notice as her back was turn. Cardin was not deciding what to do. Should he go into the bathroom and check out his new body? He could do stuff to Weiss and get Ruby hated by her. Maybe go out into Beacon and cause problems to get Ruby into trouble?

So many choices.

Of all the girls in Beacon, Ruby Rose was far from the top of 'girls I'd like to see naked'. That being said he was once again presented with a unique opportunity, a chance to experience something no guy did. Except for him, naturally. Another uncharacteristically lecherous grin appeared on Ruby's face and he snickered, sauntering over to the bathroom.

"Gotta drop a deuce, don't come in!" he chirped in his new squeaky voice. Weiss gave him a look of shock, eyebrows raised, and he winked before stepping into the bathroom. With the door locked he fumbled for the switch and turned it on, shielding his eyes as light flooded them, then found the mirror and leaned in to inspect his new self. It was uncanny seeing someone else in your own reflection. Just as strange was seeing Ruby mirror everything he did. Silly faces, seductive ones - the best approximations he could make anyways - and crude gestures. Snickering, he ran a hand through his black and red hair.

"You know... Another few years and you might actually be kind of hot, Rose. Your team's got you beat though!" Grinning, his hands latched onto his stolen chest and he squeezed. A pleasant shiver shot down his spine and he yelped, eyebrows raising at the sound. His breasts were sizable, big enough for his dainty hands, and definitely sensitive.

info.brief_description: A remote that can swap anything between people in RWBYverse. REWARDS for good additions.
info.description:
I am taking requests. If you have ideas or want to see a specific storyline extended, please let me know. I'll be happy to see what I can do.

There are a lot of swap stories taking place in the Real World and many for specific animes/cartoons. There are also plenty of RWBY stories on this site, but none of them involving swapping. This story is supposed to be fun and anyone can post. See guidelines below for information on posts and remote. I am always looking for additions and ideas.

Guidelines:
- No deaths
- Sex is fine as long as its not the focal point of every new chapter. Keep it to a minimum and not make the story all about it. There are plenty of different things to do.
- Keep the personalities of every character the same as much as possible. I understand we are not professionals, but try to avoid going wildly off the rails.
- Keep the story flowing and don't end it abruptly.
- Have good grammar, unintentional typos are OK, just try to keep it to a minimum.
- Keep the story lengthy. Usually two paragraph minimum is a good length to aim for. Avoid constant list of choices that takes several chapters besides the intro. They are annoying and giving people only a handful of choices is perfectly fine.
-Remote powers should be kept the same as below. No new buttons. If you really want to add one, message me and I may approve it if you give a good reason. This list can be updated to be cleared.
- Have fun and enjoy

Important details about the Remote
Physical:
-Body Swap – The user exchanges bodies with the target. Nothing else changes. Everyone treats the user and the target as if they were themselves. There might be minor differences such as if a guy and girl switch, but nothing will appear unusual.
-Body Part Swap – This is like Body Swap, but only targets a specific part.
-Wardrobe Swap - The user exchanges all clothes with the target. This includes clothing not warned. For all tense and purposes, the user and target have always warn those clothes. Nothing will be considered unusual. This does not include weapons.
-Clothing Swap - Like Wardrobe, but only targets a single article of clothing that can be chosen by the user.
-Life Swap – User switches lives with the target. The user will find themselves wearing the targets clothes while still in their body. Everyone else will see the two as if they were the other. Can be combined with other options, like Body Swap.

Mental:
-Personality – User switches a specific part of their personality and traits with the target. Example: Emotions, confidence, fears, likes/dislikes etc.
-Personal Info: User can swap a piece of information about themselves with the target. Weapon ownership is included here. If a weapon is swapped, the positions of the two weapons will be exchanged. Other examples include: Names, age, positions, jobs, ownerships, etc.

Other buttons:
Undo- Resets last swap made.
Reset: Puts all swaps back to normal. Good for long stories.

Other important information:
-The device only swaps the user and the target, no mass swaps or swaps between other people. Let’s add a limit to make it more challenging and thinking outside the box. Triangle swaps can bypass this.
-Anyone touching the device when it goes off is aware of swaps instead of just the user.
-The device works on animals and Grimm.
-The remote always travels with the user.


I tend to update whenever an idea comes to me. If you have something you want to add, feel free to do so. If you want to see something and are to shy to add, let me know. I'll try to take requests if people want to see specific story lines expanded.
